original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: You friend of Sorrows, yes? Together we smash White Legs that defile holy places, yes?
translation: 你是悲恸部落的朋友？让我们一起击溃玷污圣地的白腿部落，怎么样？

original: Outman! Kuna-man mad! He kill all White Legs! You talk! You stop!
translation: 外来者！火烧人疯了！他杀了所有白腿部落的人！你说！你站住！

original: Foolish outman - You best White Legs, you think? By my spear you die!
translation: 愚蠢的外来者。你以为可以击败白腿部落的人？在我的长矛下，你只有死！

original: Visions guide you. You listen? Heh. Maybe yes, maybe no.
translation: 神示指引着你，你听到了吗？呵呵，或许是，或许不是。

original: Hola, outsider. Welcome, child of omens. You come to receive visions of truth?
translation: 你好，外来者。欢迎你，预兆之子。你想来接受“真理神示”？

original: You have root of Sacred Datura?
translation: 你拿到神圣曼陀罗了吗？

original: These roots make sacred vision tea. You drink, you see path before you. Ready?
translation: 这些根用来制作“真理神示”茶。把它喝了，你就能看见前方的路。准备好了么？

original: Does Ghost of She lie quiet in grave?
translation: “她的幽灵”是否安息在坟墓里？

original: Daniel said that I was to travel with you until you have completed your scouting. Is this pleasing to you?
translation: 丹尼尔说，一旦等你执行完侦察任务，我就可以与你同行。听我这么说你高不高兴？

original: Have you reconsidered allowing me to travel with you?
translation: 你能不能重新考虑一下让我与你一起同行？

original: You are the one Joshua Graham sent to us. Blessings of the Father in the Cave on you - Daniel is waiting for you.
translation: 你就是约书亚·格拉汉姆派来的那个，愿先父保佑你。丹尼尔正在等你。

original: Greetings and blessings to you. Daniel still awaits you.
translation: 你好，祝福你。丹尼尔在等你。

original: Katu Veo. Blessings of the Father in the Cave on you.
translation: 我能感觉得到你。愿先父保佑你。

original: Katu Veo.
translation: 我能感觉得到你。

original: We go. White Legs go back to Great Salt.
translation: 我们走。白腿部落会回到大盐湖。

original: Unless you and Joshua have any objections, I'd like to start evacuating the Sorrows. I'm going to need your help, so say your piece.
translation: 除非你和约书亚有任何反对意见，否则我要开始带着悲恸部落撤离了。我将会需要你的帮助，你有什么话想说就说吧。

original: Please, have you done everything you can for the Sorrows? Are they all accounted for?!
translation: 拜托，你已经为悲恸部落做了你能做的一切了吗？你有没有为他们尽职尽责？

original: Hoi! White Legs don't leave survivors often. You're some kind of lucky, let me tell you.
translation: 嚯！白腿部落通常不会留下任何幸存者。我得跟你说，你很幸运。

original: You came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 你来自外面的世界，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: Hoi! What you doing? There's still White Legs back there!
translation: 嚯！你在干什么？白腿部落的人还在后面！

original: Wait - you came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 等等...你是从外面来的，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: Yah ah tahg! I saw you at the southern passage - you... um... you do know there were still White Legs alive when you ran off, right?
translation: 你好！我之前在南部通道那儿看见你了。你...你该知道当你跑掉时那里还有很多白腿部落的人，对吧？

original: Joshua says you need someone to guide you around the valley. He said I should go with you, if you want.
translation: 约书亚说，你需要一个人帮你做这个山谷的向导。他说我可以胜任，如果你同意的话。

original: Change your mind about bringing me along?
translation: 你改变主意了？不想带我一起走了？

original: Good job getting those supplies to Daniel. If you were a Dead Horse, you'd get a tattoo for that.
translation: 干得好，那些补给品太有用了。如果你是死马部落的人，你一定会被赐予一个纹身，标记你的贡献。

original: You again? Talk to Joshua yet?
translation: 又是你？还没和约书亚交谈？

original: What can I tell you?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: Come on, come on, no time to waste!
translation: 快点，快点，没时间浪费了！

original: Howdy, friend. Heard my little broadcast, did you? Yeah, you look the type.
translation: 你好，朋友。听到我的小广播了？哈，你看起来正是我要找的类型。

original: Howdy, friend. Heard my little broadcast, did you? Yeah, you look the type.
translation: 你好，朋友。听到我的小广播了？哈，你看起来正是我要找的类型。

original: Damn good thing you came along. Now that Ricky's skedaddled, yours is the only Pip-Boy we got.
translation: 你能跟我们来真他妈的太棒了。鉴于那个里基跑了，我们现在只有你一个人有哔哔小子了。

original: Are you here to jaw at me a while longer, or are we ready to get this show on the road?
translation: 你是在这继续跟我唠叨呢，还是我们把这场戏延续到路上呢？

original: We smash White Legs now, yes?
translation: 我们现在要痛击白腿部落，是不是？

original: Well, here we part ways. I'm needed back at the Dead Horses camp - maybe I'll see you there sometime.
translation: 好了，我们在这儿要分开了。我须要回到死马部落营地了。或许晚些我们有机会再见面。

original: This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
translation: 我们浪费太多时间了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

original: The time for talk has passed. The Lord's work must be done.
translation: 聊天的时间已经过去了，上帝的工作必须完成。

original: Daniel must have made it to the tunnel by now, but there are Sorrows all over the valley! We have to help them and get Daniel out of here!
translation: 丹尼尔一定已经抵达隧道了，但在这山谷里悲恸部落的人到处都是！我们需要帮助他们尽快离开这里！

original: We should have given you a better welcome on your first visit to Zion, but from what I hear, the White Legs beat us to it.
translation: 我们本应该热烈欢迎你第一次光临锡安，但可惜的是，白腿部落抢先了一步。

original: White Legs seem to be the only visitors we have these days, and I wouldn't have expected anyone from the Mojave to come looking for us.
translation: 白腿部落似乎是近一段时间内我们唯一的访客，我也没想到还会有人从莫哈维来这个地方找我们。

original: And you're a courier, no less. Not the one I was expecting, but I suppose he wouldn't have come with a caravan.
translation: 而你还是个邮差。不是我期待的那个人，但我想他也不会带着一整支商队来的。

original: I don't know if you were close to the other members of your group, but you have my sympathy.
translation: 我不知道你和商队里其他成员关系怎么样，但我还是要对你表示同情。

original: I pray for the safety of all good people who come to Zion, even Gentiles, but we can't expect God to do all the work.
translation: 我为每一位来到锡安的善良平民祈祷他们一切平安，即使他们是异教徒我也不会区别对待。但我们不能指望上帝做所有的工作。

original: Welcome back. What can I do for you?
translation: 欢迎你回来。我能为你做什么？

original: You looking for trouble, bud? I got plenty to spare, so watch your ass around me.
translation: 你是来找麻烦的吗，伙计？我时间多着呢，你想要我随时奉陪。

original: You looking to join this here caravan? Look a little wet behind the ears, you ask me.
translation: 就你还想加入这个商队？要我看，你还嫩着呢。

original: Hey, little lady. Don't be scared to join this caravan! I'll keep a close eye on you - real close. Promises.
translation: 嘿，小妞。想加入我们商队吗？别再犹豫了！有什么好害怕的？我会密切关注你的...非常密切，哈哈。我发誓。

original: Yeah? What's it this time?
translation: 嗯？这次是什么？

original: Fuck off, okay? I hate you!
translation: 滚开好吗？我讨厌你！

original: I may have been exaggerating a little. Truth is, I got this suit and the Pit-Boy off a dead prospector who came out from Zion.
translation: 我说得或许有点太夸张了。事实真相就是，这件外套和哔哔小子是我从一个早就死了的从锡安来的探险者身上扒下来的。

original: Guy was dead when I found him, okay? Had a ton of shit on him. That's how I know there's good loot in Zion, see?
translation: 等我发现那家伙的时候他已经死了，好吗？他身上装满了各种废物垃圾。这也就是为什么我知道锡安有很多好东西，你明白了吧？

original: Fuck off, I'm busy!
translation: 滚开，我忙得很！

original: Looking to join this caravan, huh? Look to me like you can handle yourself.
translation: 想加入这支商队？看起来你自己可以搞定。

original: Something on your mind?
translation: 你在想什么？

original: Leave me be. Busy.
translation: 别烦我。忙呢。

original: Welcome back. What can I do for you?
translation: 欢迎你回来。我能帮你做什么？

original: I do wish you'd come and met with me at the Lucky 38 when you first arrived on the Strip. Or after Benny fled, even.
translation: 你第一次到长街的时候，我本希望你能来幸运38和我碰面。即便是本尼逃走了以后也一样。

original: Goot.
translation: 天气不错。

original: Yah ah tahg.
translation: 你好。

original: Hoi!
translation: 嗨！

original: Please, is it time? Is everyone safe? We have to go!
translation: 拜托，时间到了吗？所有的人都安全抵达了吗？我们必须出发了！

original: Uh... I apologize if this comes across as a less-than-cordial welcome, but how did you get in here? You from the Mojave?
translation: 呃...很抱歉，礼数可能不周，但你是怎么来的？你来自莫哈维？

original: Do me a favor and go to talk to Joshua, all right?
translation: 请帮我个忙，去跟约书亚谈谈，好吗？

original: The Dead Horses told me details about the attack on your caravan. A stranger's sympathy might not count for much, but for what it's worth, I'm sorry.
translation: 死马部落已经把你的商队遭到袭击的事情告诉我了。尽管一个来自陌生人的同情可能没什么价值，但我觉得多少还是需要表示一下。我为你感到抱歉。

original: The Sorrows will mourn your friends, too. They mourn everyone, even the White Legs. They have sensitive souls. Innocent, if there is such a thing.
translation: 悲恸部落也会缅怀你的朋友们。他们会缅怀任何人，也包括白腿部落。他们的灵魂很敏感，容易受到伤害。如果用一个词来形容的话，那就是既天真又纯洁。

original: In spite of what's happened, I hope that Joshua and I can help you out of here. But to be frank, we need your help, too.
translation: 不论发生了什么，我希望我和约书亚能尽快帮你离开这里。但真诚地讲，我们也需要你的帮助。

original: I'm glad to see you're still with us. How can I help you?
translation: 很高兴看到你还和我们在一起。我能帮你做什么？

original: Holadu, Tsagasee.
translation: 你好，外来者。

original: Holadu, Na'ne.
translation: 你好。

original: Katu Veo. Nayoo?
translation: 我认识你。怎么了？

original: Wise man knows when to shut mouth. You maybe wise. Or maybe not.
translation: 聪明的人知道什么时候该闭嘴。你最好放聪明点。

original: Such a small thing, isn't it? And yet so... capacious. So very dear.
translation: 多么小巧的玩意，不是吗？谁又能想到它会是这么的……神通广大呢。正因如此，它才显得无比贵重。

original: Decades of hiring salvagers out west to search for this little relic in the ruins of a place called Sunnyvale. Back then, anyway.
translation: 为了这个小东西，我雇了不知多少人手，在西边被称为桑尼维尔的废墟中找了整整数十年。不过那已经成为历史了。

original: That's where the Chip was printed, on October 22, 2077. It was to have been hand-delivered to me here, at the Lucky 38, the next day.
translation: 筹码就是在那里制造的，出厂日期是2077年10月22号。它本该于次日就送到幸运38，交到我的手上。

original: But the bombs fell first. Suffice it to say, the delivery was never made.
translation: 然而核弹却比它捷足先登了。毋庸说，它根本就没有被送过来。

original: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
translation: 玩家扔手雷

original: Frag out!
translation: 扔雷啦！

original: Fire in the hole!
translation: 注意手雷！

original: Grenah!
translation: 守雷！

original: Boomb!
translation: 炸蛋！

original: Nih mah sih!
translation: 手榴蛋！

original: Bahm buh!
translation: 嘭！

original: Coriendoo!
translation: 快刨！

original: Grenahoo!
translation: 手榴蛋！

original: Deha ruido!
translation: 别炒了！

original: No discarge armoos!
translation: 别凯枪！

original: Be careful. Tribals don't always recognize those for what they are.
translation: 小心，部落民可不认识这些玩意。

original: Watch it. You can't just go tossing those all over Zion.
translation: 注意。别把这玩意丢得满锡安都是。

original: Ah del tahi, bahm buh, ya?
translation: 炸要，炸蛋，对吧？

original: A bil he neh fuhr jahd thli gai! Heh he!
translation: 白腿的警告！呵呵！

original: Ke cosa estee-na?
translation: 那是什么东东？

original: Por ke katu pongwa estee?
translation: 尼为什么把它放在那里？

original: You're not the first to have tried.
translation: 你不是第一个来试的。

original: Make the first shot count. You won't get a second.
translation: 一击必中，没有第二次机会。

original: Do'an poin aiti ay me!
translation: 别拿舞气纸着我！

original: Subai thah, tsahh.
translation: 停停。

original: No tsaig tuh beh dah a hih jih gahni a meer.
translation: 别拿舞气纸着我。

original: Stahp dahs pleez.
translation: 请憋炸样。

original: Me no heranu a katu.
translation: 我妹有桑害你。

original: Baje ka armoo.
translation: 把舞气放下。

original: Attack
translation: 攻击

original: Had enough?
translation: 够不够？

original: Come on!
translation: 来吧！

original: You like that?
translation: 爽不？

original: Take it!
translation: 接招！

original: Die where you stand!
translation: 死吧！

original: Prepare to meet your maker.
translation: 去见上帝吧！

original: Ahm naaiyawi wichoo!
translation: 窝来跟尼玩玩！

original: Deyai-yoo!
translation: 受史吧！

original: Yoocan no nikumpa me!
translation: 尼打不过窝的！

original: Nah ash ne wit deer!
translation: 窝来跟尼玩玩！

original: Shtairb!
translation: 去史吧！

original: Glahb ni kahn meer dah ah?!
translation: 尼以为尼打得过窝？！

original: Akee!
translation: 哲里一！

original: Tunnoo estee!
translation: }尝尝哲个！

original: Uweka muerna!
translation: 躺下受史！

original: This one is mine!
translation: 这货归我了！

original: Yield!
translation: 耶！

original: I have this under control!
translation: 我应付得来！

original: Gotcha!
translation: 明白了！

original: Hah!
translation: 哈！

original: Hmph!
translation: 喝啊！

original: Ugh!
translation: 呃！

original: Oof!
translation: 哦！

original: Ahh!
translation: 啊！

original: Argh!
translation: 噢！

original: Damn!
translation: 靠！

original: I'm hit!
translation: 我被打了！

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: Eh!
translation: 呃！

original: Eh!
translation: 呃！

original: Eh!
translation: 呃！

original: Eh!
translation: 呃！

original: Eh!
translation: 呃！

original: Eh!
translation: 呃！

original: Flee
translation: 逃跑

original: I'm out of here!
translation: 我要离开这儿！

original: This is hopeless!
translation: 完了！

original: Help!
translation: 救命！

original: No matanna me!
translation: 别杀窝！

original: Me no kaade muerna!
translation: 窝还不想史！

original: Me no kaade akee!
translation: 我要离开哲里！

original: This is too intense!
translation: 太可怕了！

original: We are outmatched!
translation: 我们完了！

original: They're too strong for us!
translation: 他们太强了！

original: Time to get lost!
translation: 快不行了！

original: This is a battle we cannot win!
translation: 我们赢不了！

original: Steal
translation: 偷窃

original: That doesn't belong to you!
translation: 这不是你的东西！

original: You can't just take that!
translation: 你不能这么干！

original: Thief!
translation: 小偷！

original: We're a tolerant community, but don't overstep the limits of our generosity.
translation: 我们本来很宽容，可你简直就是在挑战我们的底线！

original: This isn't a New Vegas back alley. Watch what you grab.
translation: 看看你都干了什么。

original: No! Shtay len tahbah mah ee.
translation: 不！小偷浣熊。

original: Bey haz oh neekt!
translation: 不准哲样！

original: Ponedo lawatba!
translation: 臭贼！

original: Katu! Pongwa de nuevu!
translation: 尼！把那各放回去！

original: Wa desafortuba yegwi a lawatba.
translation: 做贼妹有好下厂的。

original: Um... you know I'll share if you ask, right?
translation: 呃...你不说我怎么知道你想要？你说了我肯定给你。

original: Is... is this some kind of civilized ritual I just don't get?
translation: 这...这难道是某种我没见过的文明礼仪？

original: Is thievery not considered wrong where you come from?
translation: 偷窃这种行为，难道在你来的地方一点也不可耻吗？

original: Is your need for possessions truly so great?
translation: 你真的那么需要钱吗？

original: Better not try that again.
translation: 最好别再试了。

original: That sort of thing might be seen as a dumb prank in the Mojave, but it will get you killed out here.
translation: 这点小计俩也就在莫哈维可以胡闹，但这来纯粹是送死。

original: Maiku.
translation: 嚎的。

original: Lah.
translation: 嚎吧。

original: Paz patasooba.
translation: 安静的揍吧。

original: Assault
translation: 突击

original: What the hell?!
translation: 我操？！

original: What was that for?
translation: 怎么回事？

original: You dirty coward!
translation: 你个胆小鬼！

original: <Low growl>
translation: <低声咆哮>

original: Ye have sown death and so shall ye reap it!
translation: 准备受死！

original: Varoom? Stahp!
translation: 为神摸？别！

original: Ah!
translation: 啊！

original: Ayud me!
translation: 救窝！

original: Wa golpe me!
translation: 窝被打中叻！

original: Wa ataco me!
translation: 窝被袭鸡叻！

original: Murder
translation: 杀人犯

original: No!
translation: 不！

original: Murderer!
translation: 凶手！

original: What have you done?
translation: 你都干了些什么？

original: That's enough!
translation: 够了！

original: <Roar of anger.>
translation: <愤怒>

original: Baika-ker!
translation: 撒手！

original: Devil!
translation: 恶魔！

original: Geh bits ah!
translation: 快刨！

original: Chin dee!
translation: 摸鬼！

original: Katu matanna ud!
translation: 尼把他撒了！

original: Asekene!
translation: 撒人凶手！

original: Nona! Asekenoo-na!
translation: 喔不！一个撒人犯！

original: Whoa! Was that necessary?
translation: 哇！真有必要吗？

original: Are you sick in the head or something?
translation: 你脑子坏了吗？

original: What demon would possess you to do such a thing?
translation: 你这是中什么邪了？

original: Are you suffering a brain fever? I have herbs that can curb such... violent tendencies.
translation: 你是不是头脑发热？我有些药膏...可以帮你治一下。

original: Grrrraah!
translation: 咳啊！

original: Yaargh!
translation: 呀戈！

original: Rrrraaahhh!
translation: 呃啊啊啊啊！

original: Huurrraghh!
translation: 咳啊啊啊！

original: <Strenuous grunt.>
translation: <奇怪的咕哝。>

original: <Strenuous grunt.>
translation: <奇怪的咕哝。>

original: <Strenuous grunt.>
translation: <奇怪的咕哝。>

original: <Strenuous grunt.>
translation: <奇怪的咕哝。>

original: Ehrr!
translation: 呃！

original: Ehrr!
translation: 呃！

original: Ehrr!
translation: 呃！

original: A pointless death.
translation: 死得真冤。

original: That should have been avoided.
translation: 本可以避免的。

original: Dahs wur bahd.
translation: 那太糟叻。

original: Ow wah!
translation: 哎哟！

original: Powee desafortuba...
translation: 太不幸叻...

original: Howdy. My name is Jed Masterson, and I'm a caravan boss for the Happy Trails Caravan Company.
translation: 你好。我的名字叫杰德·马斯特森，我是“欢乐小径”商队公司的老板。

original: If you're hearing this, I have a job offer for you. Happy Trails is organizing an expedition north into Utah, off the Long 15, and we need people.
translation: 如果你正在听这条广播，我可以告诉你，我们向你提出一份工作邀请。“欢乐小径”商队正在组织一次前往犹他的远征，我们将沿着15号国道前进，现在正在征集人手。

original: We're looking for caravan guards, prospectors, couriers - if you're used to humping it across the Wastes straight toward trouble, we want you.
translation: 我们正在寻找商队守卫、登山老手，以及向导。如果你有任何一方面的才能，请及时和我们联系，我们需要你这样的人才。

original: If you've got a Pip-Boy, we definitely want you.
translation: 如果你有哔哔小子，那再好不过了。

original: On the other hand, if you're a greenhorn or a city-slicker spinning tales about your skills, you can kindly go hang.
translation: 相反，如果你只是个涉世未深的毛头小子或街头混混，那就找个墙角自己撞上去吧。

original: If we like your gumption, we'll pay you square and treat you fair. Find me, Jed Masterson, at the Northern Passage if you're interested. Luck to you.
translation: 如果你的进取心能让我们满意，那么我们将给予你丰富的报酬和奖励。好了，如果你感兴趣的话，请到北部通道来找我。祝你好运。

original: Let's talk about your tactics.
translation: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

original: Tactics? You know I'm not much of a fighter, right?
translation: 战术？你知道这我可不是特别擅长。

original: Battle is not my strongest skill, but I am eager to learn from you.
translation: 战斗不是我的强项，但我非常渴望学习。

original: What have you to teach me of tactics?
translation: 你可以教我什么吗？

original: Let's get going.
translation: 我们走。

original: Right behind you.
translation: 我就跟在你身后。

original: I walk in your footsteps.
translation: 好的，我会跟紧的。

original: It's time for us to part ways.
translation: 我们该分道扬镳了。

original: You sure? It's easy to get lost out here without a guide.
translation: 你确定？没有向导的话你会很容易迷路的。

original: Go back to your people's camp.
translation: 回你族人的营地去。

original: Daniel was firm about my staying with you. Are you certain?
translation: 丹尼尔希望我跟着你。你确定？

original: Go back to your people's camp.
translation: 回你族人的营地去。

original: Ha ha ha. I don't think so.
translation: 哈哈哈，我可不这么想。

original: I think we should travel together.
translation: 我觉得我们应该同行。

original: Joshua said I might be going with you. Let's go then!
translation: 约书亚说我该跟你一起。我们走吧！

original: I want you to travel with me.
translation: 我希望你能跟我一起旅行。

original: I am happy to offer you what guidance I can. Let's go.
translation: 我很高兴能做你的向导。我们走吧。

original: I want you to travel with me.
translation: 我希望你能跟我一起旅行。

original: The path lies before us. Let's not waste any time.
translation: 道路就在不远的前方。我们抓紧时间吧。

original: God protect me!
translation: 上帝保佑！

original: Lord, make me thy instrument!
translation: 主啊，请保佑我！

original: God and liberty!
translation: 为了上帝与自由！

original: Deyai-yoo, devil!
translation: 去死八，恶魔！

original: Wes run!
translation: 刨起来！

original: Nikumpa me!
translation: 跟窝打！

original: Momewi de luchoo!
translation: 战斗的时后到叻！

original: Mes luchoo ahorla!
translation: 窝们现在战斗吧！

original: Me derote katu!
translation: 窝要打拜尼！

original: Shtairb, chin dee!
translation: 史吧，魔鬼！

original: Sohl tyeh!
translation: 窝们肘！

original: Dah ah hi meer!
translation: 来打窝！

original: Let's take them!
translation: 来吧！

original: This one's mine!
translation: 这个人是我的！

original: I'm with you.
translation: 我帮你。

original: Let's go!
translation: 我们走！

original: For the Sorrows!
translation: 为了悲恸部落！

original: Hyah!
translation: 呀！

original: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
translation: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

original: Glad to hear it. I wouldn't want to go back to Joshua alone.
translation: 很高兴听到你这么说。我可不想一个人回到约书亚那里去。

original: Good. Daniel's decisions are wise. You are wise for respecting them.
translation: 好的。丹尼尔的决定很聪明。你也不赖，至少还知道尊重他们。

original: Good, because I wasn't going to leave.
translation: 好极了，因为我本来就没打算走。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: All right. Joshua won't be too happy, but all right.
translation: 好。不过我恐怕约书亚会不高兴的。

original: If that is your wish, I cannot change your mind. I will wait for you at the Sorrows' camp until you return.
translation: 如果你这么希望，那好，我尊重你的想法。我会在悲恸部落等你回来的。

original: I'm not going anywhere. Get the idea out of your head and get moving.
translation: 我哪儿也不去。赶快把你那个鬼想法从脑子里赶出去。

original: Got it.
translation: 知道了。

original: As you say.
translation: 如你所说。

original: Yes, of course.
translation: 好的，当然。

original: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

original: Now you're thinking like a hunter! I like this plan.
translation: 现在你越来越像个猎手了！我很欣赏你的计划。

original: That seems sensible. I'd prefer to let you choose the targets.
translation: 听起来不错。你先挑目标好了。

original: What's the point?
translation: 有什么意义？

original: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

original: You're starting to sound like the old Joshua. Okay, got it.
translation: 你的口气听起来就像以前的约书亚。好的，明白。

original: Isn't a more diplomatic approach preferable? Very well, but I'm not comfortable with this.
translation: 还有更好的选择吗？唉，总感觉不是很舒服。

original: It's the only way I know.
translation: 这正是我所喜欢的方式。

original: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down, yea, we wept, when we remembered Zion.
translation: 我们曾坐在巴比伦的河畔，在那里我们一想起锡安就哭了。

original: Remember, O Lord, the children of Edom in the day of Jerusalem who said, "Raze it, raze it, even to the foundation."
translation: 耶和华啊！求你记念以东人在耶路撒冷遭难的日子所行的，他们说：“拆毁它，拆毁它，直拆到根基。”

original: O daughter of Babylon, who art to be destroyed. Happy shall he be, that rewardeth thee as thou hast served us.
translation: 注定灭亡的巴比伦城啊！照着你待我们的行为报复你的，那人有福了。

original: Happy shall he be, that taketh and dasheth thy little ones against the stones.
translation: 抓住你的婴孩摔在磐石上的，那人有福了。

original: Do you know what it means?
translation: 你知道这是什么意思吗？

original: If I don't make it... tell Joshua... I tried.
translation: 如果我倒下了...请告诉约书亚...我尽力了。

original: Looks like I'm headed for the big dark....
translation: 看来我要拥抱无尽的黑暗了...

original: Sorry... I let you down....
translation: 对不起...我让你失望了...

original: Even my best herbs won't work if I'm dead... I need help!
translation: 如果我死了，最好的药物都不起作用了...请帮助我！

original: I will not leave my children orphans!
translation: 我不会让我的孩子成为孤儿！

original: If I fall... save the Sorrows... please.
translation: 如果我倒下了...请拯救悲恸部落...

original: I could use some help here!
translation: 请给我点帮助！

original: I won't last long at this rate!
translation: 这样下去我支撑不了多久！

original: Can I get some backup? Healing? Something?
translation: 我可以用点备用品吗？治疗针或其他什么的？

original: My wounds are getting worse!
translation: 我的伤口正在恶化！

original: I can't keep up this pace much longer!
translation: 再这样下去我坚持不了多久了！

original: I need healing powder!
translation: 我需要医疗粉！

original: Wake
translation: 醒来

original: This is not the most pleasant place I've woken up.
translation: 虽然我醒了，但一点儿也不开心。

original: My head feels about to burst. At least that means I'm still alive.
translation: 我的头好疼。至少我还活着。

original: Is it normal to hurt all over after a battle?
translation: 一场大战之后现在感觉浑身无力。

original: Oh, look, I'm not dead.
translation: 嘿，看，我还活着！

original: Okay, okay, I'm up. What's next?
translation: 好的，好的，我起来了。下一步怎么办？

original: They're cutting through me like paper!
translation: 他们砍我就像切菜！

original: This armor is useless!
translation: 这护甲没用了！

original: I cannot defend myself against this!
translation: 我已经保护不了我自己了！

original: I need better armor!
translation: 我需要更强悍的护甲！

original: I don't think I'm hurting them at all!
translation: 我已经没法战斗了！

original: Are you sure this weapon actually works?
translation: 你确定这个武器还能用？

original: My attacks are doing nothing!
translation: 我的攻击毫无效果！

original: Might as well tickle them with a feather!
translation: 拳头打在他们身上就跟弹了一根羽毛似的！

original: Got anything bigger I can fight with?
translation: 赶快给我点新武器！

original: No more bullets!
translation: 没子弹了！

original: I'm shooting dry here!
translation: 我没弹药了！

original: I have no more bullets!
translation: 我没子弹了！

original: I need a reload!
translation: 我需要弹药！

original: My guns are empty!
translation: 我的枪要空了！

original: There... hopefully it won't fall off now.
translation: 那儿...好了，感觉好点了。

original: Now that's good medicine!
translation: 这药太有效了！

original: This is much more effective than I expected!
translation: 效果比我预期的还好！

original: If only I had more of this medicine to share with the tribe.
translation: 要是这玩意再多点我一定会分享给我的部落的。

original: Crippled
translation: 残废

original: Ahh! I'm going to need a healer!
translation: 啊！我需要治疗！

original: Hope you've got medicine better than some sticky herbs!
translation: 赶快来帮帮我！

original: I fear I will need more than my herbs to fix this....
translation: 我恐怕快不行了...

original: This wound is grievous! I need help!
translation: 好疼啊！我需要帮助！

original: Regenerating
translation: 治愈中

original: Good as new!
translation: 完好如初了！

original: Just what the medicine man ordered!
translation: 一切正常！

original: That should keep me going a while longer.
translation: 估计还能再撑一会了。

original: Much improved.
translation: 感觉好多了。

original: I feel better already.
translation: 我已经没事了。

original: Poison
translation: 中毒

original: Feeling the poison here!
translation: 感觉好像中毒了！

original: I'm not feeling so good....
translation: 我有些不舒服...

original: I've been poisoned!
translation: 我中毒了！

original: This wound needs to be sucked out, quickly!
translation: 快帮我把毒吸出来！

original: I need some Radscorpion glands and Nightstalker blood to treat this poison.
translation: 我得弄点辐射蝎毒囊或者夜行兽血来以毒攻毒。

original: I look like a pack Brahmin to you? Come on, we travel light!
translation: 你觉得我是个驮运婆罗门吗？来吧，我们轻装上阵！

original: I will be more useful to you traveling light.
translation: 我们还是慢慢地走比较好。

original: Like the shadow of a ghost.
translation: 我们就像阴影下的幽灵。

original: We pass like moonlight on still water.
translation: 我们就像洒在寂静水面上的月光。

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: I need to think about this.
translation: 我需要考虑一下。

original: Even our Lord had doubts. Think it over, but listen to your heart. And do it quickly. We don't have much time.
translation: 即使我们仁慈的主也有存疑的时候。仔细考虑一下，听听你内心的想法，然后快速采取行动。我们剩下的时间不多了。

original: Don't worry. I think leaving Zion is for the best.
translation: 别担心，我想离开锡安是现在最好的选择。

original: It may be. I hope it is. To tell the truth, if something goes wrong, more Sorrows could die in the escape than in Joshua's proposed attack.
translation: 也许是吧。希望如此。但跟你实话实说，万一我们在撤离的路上出了什么差错，受难的族人可能会比加入约书亚作战的计划要死得更多。

original: Even knowing that, it's a risk I have to take. With your help, and Joshua's, even if we're attacked, we can defend the Sorrows and escape.
translation: 不过即使心里清楚后果，我也要冒这个风险。有你和约书亚的帮助，即使我们遭到攻击，我们也有余力保护好悲恸部落并顺利撤离。

original: We'll be traveling at night, in small groups, across the valley. With luck, the White Legs won't know what's happened until the next morning.
translation: 我们将在夜晚出发，分成小组行动，直穿山谷。运气好的话，白腿部落直到第二天早上才会知道到底发生了什么事。

original: But if the White Legs realize what's happening... Joshua and I will need you to help us escape. Don't hold back. I promise you, the White Legs won't.
translation: 但如果白腿部落立即意识到事态的进展...约书亚和我就需要你的帮助了。不过别担心，我向你保证他们绝对没那么聪明。

original: Once our path is clear, I'll give you everything you need to get back to the Mojave, but the Pine Creek tunnel must be collapsed behind us.
translation: 一旦计划顺利，我就会给你所有可以帮助你回到莫哈维的东西，但是在此之前，我们身后的松溪涵洞必须完全坍塌。

original: It's the only way to delay the White Legs' pursuit long enough for us to get a head start. Good luck, and may God be with us.
translation: 这是唯一可以延缓白腿部落追击我们的方法。好了，祝你好运，愿上帝与你同在。

original: I think Joshua's right. We should fight the White Legs.
translation: 我认为约书亚说得没错，我们应该和白腿部落开战。

original: No. Why? Why? Haven't you seen enough of what's going on here to see that the Sorrows don't need to butcher the White Legs for a piece of land?
translation: 不，为什么？为什么？你还没看清楚这里发生了什么吗？悲恸部落没有必要为了一块土地屠杀白腿部落。

original: What Joshua wants is more than an attack. He wants a slaughter. And he needs more than you and the Dead Horses to do it.
translation: 约书亚想要的不仅仅只是发起进攻，他还想要大规模杀戮。除了你和死马部落外他还需要更多人参与到他的计划中。

original: The Sorrows can't be pushed into this. You and Joshua don't have the right to force them into it. Please, consider what I'm saying.
translation: 悲恸部落不能参与到其中来。你和约书亚没有权利强迫他们参与。请仔细掂量一下我对你说的这些吧。

original: I checked on everything in the valley and got you the map of Grand Staircase.
translation: 我检查了山谷的每一处地点，找到了你要的大阶梯地图。

original: I appreciate it. Well, that's it. This is all we need. Now all that's left is to quietly pack up and try to get out of here without being noticed.
translation: 我很感激。就是它了。这就是我们急需的。现在剩下的安排就是收拾我们的行李，然后不动声色地尽快离开。

original: That's assuming that Joshua won't try to stop me. And that he hasn't talked you into fighting the White Legs despite what I've said.
translation: 当然，前提是约书亚不会来阻止我。现在看来除了我说的这些外，他还没有告诉你他想与白腿部落开战的计划。

original: Don't worry. I don't hold it against you. You're a -  an outsider. Fighting seems like the practical solution. But there's more than that at stake.
translation: 别担心，我并不是想防范你。你只是个...外来者。尽管战争似乎是很实际的解决办法，但要冒的风险太多了。

original: Joshua told me you needed a few things. I think this is everything.
translation: 约书亚告诉我说你需要某些东西，我想这就是了。

original: Well I'll be. I was starting to lose hope we'd be able to get any of this, much less all of it. Tribals are smart but... well, they're ignorant.
translation: 确实。我已经开始失去信心，我很怀疑我们是否能渡过当前的难关。部落的族人很聪明，但...某种程度上来说，他们还很无知。

original: Letting go of a taboo is difficult for them, so I knew it would have to be one of us. Turns out all it took was a Gentile. Or, uh... no offense.
translation: 更不用说某些禁忌对他们的影响，除非我们当中必须有人站出来。结果现在，一个异教徒出现在我眼前。哦...对不起，我并没有冒犯之意。

original: These supplies are a godsend, but if we're going to evacuate Zion without drawing more White Leg attention, I need you to go back into the valley.
translation: 锡安对他们来说是上帝的恩赐，但我们现在须要偷偷撤离锡安，并躲开白腿部落的监视。现在，请回到山谷去。

original: Specifically, I need you to scout out some locations for White Legs and try to recover a map of Grand Staircase, a wilderness area to the east.
translation: 确切地说，我需要你侦查白腿部落的几处区域，找到一张“大阶梯”地图。那是在锡安东面的一处广袤区域。

original: There's also the matter of the roads. We're going to be heading out of the east side of the park, but I'm not sure the way is clear.
translation: 然后就是路线的问题。我们打算走公园东路出去，但我不确定这条路线是否可行。

original: <White Bird stares at you wordlessly.>
translation: <白鸟无言地盯着你>

original: What? I don't know what "visions of truth" means.
translation: 什么？“真理神示”是什么意思？

original: Take drugs! Kill a bear!
translation: 嗑药！杀熊！

original: Seek medicine plant! Return with Sacred Datura Root! Receive visions of truth, they guide you!
translation: 寻找药用植物！带神圣曼陀罗根回来！接受真理神示，它会带引你！

original: Umm... Goodbye.
translation: 嗯...再见。

original: Not yet. I had some questions first.
translation: 还没，我想先问几个问题。

original: It's done.
translation: 搞定了。

original: Then visions of truth are at an end. Will you learn from truth? Maybe yes. Maybe no. Only for you to decide.
translation: 那么真理神示结束了。但至于你能否得到真理？或许可以，或许不可以。只有你能决定。

original: Here, take. Gift, to remind you of visions. Use well. Or sell to curio trader. Either way, says much about you.
translation: 给，这是给你的礼物，可以时刻警醒你。恰当使用，或者扔掉，都可以。因为这都是你的选择。

original: Not yet. I need a moment.
translation: 还没，要再等一下。

original: Tea will wait. Me? Maybe not.
translation: 茶会等你的。我？或许没那么多耐心。

original: All right, let's do this.
translation: 准备好了，开始吧。

original: Drink. Tea is strong. Tea is bitter. Wisdom is strong. Wisdom is bitter. You see?
translation: 喝吧。这个茶很浓，但也很苦。智慧也是如此，你明白吗？

original: Not yet. I had some questions first.
translation: 还没，我想先问几个问题。

original: I have the sacred datura here.
translation: 我已经拿到神圣曼陀罗根了。

original: These roots make sacred vision tea. You drink, you see path before you. Ready?
translation: 这些根用来制作“真理神示”茶。把它喝了，你就能看见前方的路。准备好了么？

original: I'm ready to go to Zion.
translation: 我已经准备好出发了。

original: Just like that, huh? You got guts, I'll give you that. You sure you want to jump in blind? Ain't got no questions about where we're going or why?
translation: 这么有劲，哈！小子有种，我看好你。不过我看你现在还一无所知，你对我们要去哪里，为什么要去没有疑问吗？

original: Okay, let's do it! Zion here we come!
translation: 好了，我们出发吧！锡安，我们来了！

original: I bet you are, but we only got room for one more on this expedition. You'll have to leave your friends behind.
translation: 好的，但我们这趟旅行带不了那么多人。你最好把你的朋友都留下。

original: We're all ready to get going.
translation: 我们已经准备好了。

original: I bet you are, but we only got room for one more on this expedition. You'll have to leave your friend behind.
translation: 好的，但我们这趟旅行带不了那么多人。你最好把你的朋友都留下。

original: We're both set. Let's go.
translation: 我们准备好了。走吧。

original: I bet you are, but you ain't going nowhere loaded down like a pack brahmin.
translation: 我说，你把自己的背包装得那么大，你以为你是头牛吗？

original: I bet you are, but you ain't going nowhere loaded down like a pack brahmin.
translation: 我说，你把自己的背包装得那么大，你以为你是头牛吗？

original: Are you now? You know we ain't coming back this way for a good long while now, right? And you know about the weight limit?
translation: 你就这么走？你要知道，这趟路途可是相当遥远的，而且短时间内是不会回来的。你也知道自己能背多少东西吧？

original: I don't want no whining about "Oh, Mr. Masterson, I left my one-of-a-kind plasma cannon back at base, can we go back for it?"
translation: 我可不想听你走到半路时跟我发牢骚，“哦，马斯特森先生，我有一把重要的等离子炮落家里了，能不能先回去一趟？”

original: You sure you're ready now?
translation: 怎么样，现在就出发吗？

original: All right, let's go. I'm ready.
translation: 好了，我们出发吧，我准备好了。

original: You sure about that this time? We ain't coming back for a while.
translation: 你确定吗？一旦出发，短时间内我们可是不会回来的。

original: No, not yet.
translation: 不，还没。

original: Hurry! There isn't any time to waste! We have to get out of here and collapse the tunnel behind us!
translation: 快点！别再浪费时间了！我们必须整个隧道塌陷之前离开这里！

original: Yes, go!
translation: 好的，走！

original: You've done more than I could have ever hoped for. Thank you. And may God protect you for all of your days. Goodbye.
translation: 你的贡献远远超出我对你的预期。衷心地谢谢你，愿上帝无时不刻保佑你。再见。

original: You let them die! They needed you! Why didn't you help them?!
translation: 你置他们的死于不顾！他们需要你！你为什么不帮助他们？！

original: Nevermind. I don't have time for this. Take the map. Just take it and go!
translation: 算了，我已经没时间和你吵了。拿着这张地图。拿着它快走！

original: Your power is broken. You cannot hope to prevail here. Leave this valley in peace.
translation: 你的政权已经倒塌了，你没有资格继续呆在这里。安静的离开这个山谷吧。

original: We leave, but always fight, White Legs! We strong warriors for Caesar!
translation: 我们会走的，但我们还是会战斗。为了白腿部落！我们是凯撒最强的战士！

original: Time to die, General Gobbledegook!
translation: 去死吧，天书将军！

original: You mock White Legs! You die now!
translation: 你侮辱了我们白腿部落！是你死！

original: Wait! There's no reason this has to end in bloodshed!
translation: 等等！没必要以流血收场！

original: [SUCCEEDED] You speak. I listen. Kill you, maybe I not. Maybe.
translation: [成功] 你说吧，我听着。或许我不该杀你，或许吧。

original: [FAILED] Weak words you talk! Now you see strong spears better than weak words!
translation: [失败] 你说的都是空话！现在你会看到有力的矛胜过软弱的言语！

original: Can't we just, you know, be friends?
translation: 我们能不能，你知道的，做朋友？

original: That's all. Let's get going.
translation: 就这样。我们走吧。

original: Enough about tactics. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 战术啥的就说这么多吧。我们来谈点别的。

original: You're good. Let's get going.
translation: 你很好。我们走吧。

original: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你的距离把控得不错。我们来谈点别的。

original: Spread out and keep your distance from me.
translation: 离我远点，保持一定的距离。

original: Stay close to me.
translation: 向我靠近。

original: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
translation: 我们来讨论一下我们之间应该保持多远的距离。

original: Wait here.
translation: 在这等着。

original: I want to trade equipment.
translation: 我想交换装备。

original: I want you to use ranged weapons.
translation: 我要你使用远程武器。

original: I don't want you to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 我不希望你主动出击，除非我先开始战斗。

original: Switch to a melee weapon.
translation: 转换到近战武器。

original: That's all. Let's get going.
translation: 这就样。我们走吧。

original: Lead on, I'll follow.
translation: 你带头，我跟着。

original: I will try to follow your example.
translation: 我会跟着你的。

original: That's it for your tactics. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你就保持这样的战术。我们来谈点别的吧。

original: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我希望当你看见敌人时，就立刻向他们发起攻击。

original: I want you to change your combat style.
translation: 我希望你能改变你的战斗方式。

original: Let's talk about your tactics.
translation: 我们来讨论一下你的战术。

original: Let's go.
translation: 我们走。

original: I want you to travel with me.
translation: 我希望你能跟我一起旅行。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: No, I've changed my mind.
translation: 不，我改变主意了。

original: Go back to your people's camp.
translation: 回你族人的营地去。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hmm... all right, I reckon you know your limits.
translation: [成功] 恩...好，我看出来你心里有数。

original: You keel over on me out there, though, and I'll leave your ass. After we take everything useful you crammed in your pack.
translation: 就算跪下来给我磕头，我也不会睬你。等我们收拾好以后，你就赶快把你的背包塞满。

original: Relax, I've humped this load across the Mojave on my own two feet long enough. I can handle it.
translation: 别紧张，我就靠着这两只脚，在莫哈维已经摸爬滚打了很长的时间了。没问题的。

original: [FAILED] That's exactly what I'm worried about. We got us some passes tighter than a virgin on her wedding night up there.
translation: [失败] 我担心的就是这个。我们要经过的几条小道，比新婚之夜的处女还要紧。

original: Last thing I need is some greenhorn getting stuck on a rock, slowing the whole caravan down.
translation: 我最不愿看到的，就是一些毛毛躁躁的小伙子把自己卡在石头里，然后就因为他们拖慢了整个商队的速度。

original: Hey, man, I'm cool. I got a big backpack and everything!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我很酷。你瞧，我有一个大大的背包，里面装满了各种东西！

original: [FAILED] That's exactly what I'm worried about. We got us some passes tighter than a-  well, tighter than a Chairman's fist up there.
translation: [失败] 我担心的就是这个。我们要经过的几条小道，比新...  嗯，比会长帮的拳头握得还紧。

original: You get stuck in there, you'll slow the whole caravan down while we pry you loose. Begging your pardon, ma'am.
translation: 你要是把自己卡住了，整个商队的速度就会因为你被拖累。上帝啊，快来救救我们吧。

original: Hey, man, I'm cool. I got a big backpack and everything!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我很酷。你瞧，我有一个大大的背包，里面装满了各种东西！

original: Why the weight limit?
translation: 为什么要限制负重？

original: You ain't never been to Zion, have you? We'll be passing through a whole mess of narrow slot canyons and high, rough passes.
translation: 你是不是从来没去过锡安？我们这一路要翻越数不尽的峡谷与山脉，所有的道路都坎坷荆棘，泥泞不堪。

original: A big pack'll get you wedged in like a Super Mutant crawling through a storm drain, and too much weight will kill you in the thin air.
translation: 一个巨大的背包会令你像一个卡在下水道里的超级变种人，而且太多的重量会令微薄的空气直接威胁你的生命。

original: Actually, let me take care of some more things first.
translation: 实际上，我还有些别的事要办。

original: Fair enough. Come on back when you're ready.
translation: 没问题。等你准备好了就回来。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: Well, all right then. Let's get moving. We've got a long road ahead of us...
translation: 那么，好吧。我们出发。接下来，可有一段相当长的路在等待我们...

original: Hang on - ain't you the one that wiped out the Crimson Caravan's Vegas branch not too long ago?
translation: 等等，你就是那个不久前干掉了赤红商队维加斯分部的家伙？

original: Ought to thank you for that - knocking McLafferty out of the running gives Happy Trails a market to expand into.
translation: 我真要为此感谢你，把麦克拉弗蒂踢出局让我们“欢乐小径”又多了一块可以开辟的市场。

original: Wait a minute, I recognize you. Yeah... you're Alice McLafferty's rising star, ain't you?
translation: 等一下，我认得你。呃...你就是爱丽丝·麦克拉弗蒂的明日之星，对吧？

original: You sure you want to be here? McLafferty's non-competes are pretty rigid.
translation: 你确定你要跟我们走？麦克拉弗蒂的竞业禁止条款可是相当严格。

original: Damn good thing you came along, too. We had another prospect with a Pip-Boy, but he done skedaddled. Something must've spooked the boy.
translation: 你能从大老远赶来真是太棒了。我们本来有一个拥有哔哔小子的队友，但他跑了。不知是不是有什么东西把他吓到了。

original: Why are you called Follows-Chalk?
translation: 为什么你叫追踪印记？

original: Our advance scouts leave chalk signs to mark places rich with game. I'm not a full scout yet, so I follow the marks and guide the hunters.
translation: 我们的高级侦察兵会在有猎物的地方用白垩粉做上标记。我还不是一个高级侦察兵，所以我的任务是跟随着这些标记，引导我们的猎人。

original: I don't have any more questions. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我没有什么问题了。我们谈点别的吧。

original: Ask away.
translation: 尽管问。

original: I want to know more about you.
translation: 我想对你多了解一点。

original: What can I tell you?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: I had some other questions.
translation: 我还有些别的问题。

original: Shoot.
translation: 说吧。

original: Warlords? How dangerous are they?
translation: 军阀？他们怎么个危险法？

original: Dangerous enough we won't be going near them if we can help it. I got no desire for my head to decorate some little gas station fort's walls, thanks.
translation: 他们非常危险，对我们来说，只要能不靠近他们就不靠近。我可不希望自己的头被插在什么小城堡的墙上当成他们的装饰品。谢谢。

original: Degenerate tribes?
translation: 堕落的部落？

original: That's right. The folks that lived in Zion before the war, they didn't just get a little savage, they're downright feral.
translation: 对的，战前居住在锡安的人们，他们不仅仅是变得野蛮，他们已经是彻头彻尾的野蛮人了。

original: Most of them don't even speak English any more - you got to get yourself a New Canaanite translator to talk to them.
translation: 他们大部分人都已经不再说英文了，你需要找一个新迦南人帮你做翻译。

original: The ones you really got to watch out for are the White Legs, from the Great Salt Lake. They'll attack just about anyone that ain't one of theirs.
translation: 你需要真正注意的是白腿部落，他们来自大盐湖。他们会向每一个非自己同族的人发起攻击。

original: Tell me about the raiders.
translation: 跟我说说有关掠夺者的事。

original: They're about what you'd expect - crazy, jacked up on chems, violent as hell, and not too bright.
translation: 他们和你预期的没什么两样——愚蠢、滥用药剂、崇尚暴力，而且脑子不行。

original: The worst are the 80s, but we won't be passing through their turf on this run.
translation: 最糟糕的是那些80号公路帮的人，但好在这次我们不会经过他们的地盘。

original: You don't know what happened to their mission?
translation: 你不知道他们的传教后来结果如何？

original: Nope - hence this caravan. If we don't make contact with the New Canaanites, Happy Trails might as well just shrivel up and die.
translation: 不知道，因为我们只是支商队。如果我们因此和新迦南人中断相互之间的联系，那么“欢乐小径”的生意也会枯萎死去。

original: Do you know anything about their religion?
translation: 你对他们的宗教了解多少？

original: I ain't a prayin' man myself. They paid for their goods and dealt square with us, that's all I ever cared about.
translation: 我自己是不信教的。对我来说，只要他们愿意为物资和食品和我们做交易就足够了。

original: But don't think that just because they're religious that they're pacifists. They take care of their own, and they're damn fine marksmen too.
translation: 不过可千万不要天真地以为他们信教他们就是和平主义者。他们自己会管好他们自己的事，而且他们个个都像天生的神枪手。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You ain't wrong. Losing the Salt Lake City run really stung us. If we can't re-establish contact with this run, we'll be in real trouble.
translation: [成功] 你说的没错，失去盐湖城这条生意线对我们打击很大。如果不能早日重建这条贸易路线，我们就有大麻烦了。

original: It sounds like Happy Trails isn't in the best financial shape.
translation: 听起来现在“欢乐小径”的财务状况并不是很好。

original: [FAILED] We do all right, don't you worry about us. Got enough in the kitty to pay you, anyways.
translation: [失败] 我们干得还不错，别替我们瞎操心。总之我有足够的钱付给你就是了。

original: So, you guys are totally rich, right?
translation: 所以，你们这些人都富得流油，对吧？

original: Why can't you get to Salt Lake City?
translation: 你们为什么不去盐湖城？

original: Without New Canaan's mission in Zion, the only ways to Salt Lake City are down the old I-80 or up through Ogden.
translation: 失去了新迦南人在锡安的布教，我们只有沿着I-80这条老高速路才能到盐湖城，或者穿过北方的奥格登。

original: The highway's too risky - NCR's rangers are so busy here in the Mojave they don't have the manpower to keep the raiders off.
translation: 但这条高速路太危险了。NCR的游骑兵们在莫哈维事情太多，他们没有足够的人手可以腾出来清理那些四处游曳的掠夺者。

original: Ogden's just too far - we'd lose more in travel expenses than we'd ever earn.
translation: 奥格登又太远了...走奥格登的话我们的成本远远高于我们的收益。

original: All right, I'll come back when I'm carrying less than 75 pounds.
translation: 好吧，等我把负重减到75磅以下再来。

original: There's a chest over yonder, you can store your extra in that. It'll be safe as can be until you get back.
translation: 那边有一个箱子，你可以把你多余的物品放在里面。别担心，不会有问题，等你回来时你会发现里面什么东西也不会少。

original: There's a chest over yonder, you can store your extra in that. It'll be safe as can be until you get back.
translation: 那边有一个箱子，你可以把你多余的物品放在里面。别担心，不会有问题，等你回来时你会发现里面什么东西也不会少。

original: All right, I'll come back when I'm carrying less than 100 pounds.
translation: 好吧，等我把负重减到100磅以下就回来。

original: Who is Joshua Graham, and why shouldn't I talk about him?
translation: 约书亚·格拉汉姆是谁？为什么我不能谈论他？

original: Just don't. It makes the New Canaanites powerful uncomfortable, and it scares the britches off the tribals.
translation: 千万别。这个名字会让新迦南人浑身不舒服，而且会吓到当地的部落。

original: Don't talk about the Burned Man either, while you're at it. Trust me on this one, it's for your own good.
translation: 而且等你到了那儿，也不要谈起“火烧人”。相信我，这都是为你好。

original: Tell me more about the job.
translation: 跟我说说这份工作。

original: The job is simple - help us get this caravan into Zion and find New Canaan. The pay is 25 caps per day, half up front, half on return.
translation: 这份工作很简单，帮我们把这支商队带入锡安，然后找到新迦南人。报酬每天25个瓶盖，先行支付一半，另一半回来之后给。

original: You'll get a bonus if we make it into Zion, plus another bonus if we reach New Canaan.
translation: 如果到达锡安，你会额外得到一笔奖金。如果到达新迦南，再加一笔奖金。

original: Oh, one more thing - don't mention the name Joshua Graham to anyone. Anyone.
translation: 哦，还有一件事，不要向任何人提起约书亚·格兰汉姆这个名字。任何人。

original: How about a game of Caravan to kill some time?
translation: 来一盘大篷车扑克怎么样？

original: Should have figured you for a player. All right, let's play.
translation: 看不出来你也会玩这个。好，陪你玩一盘。

original: Another one, huh? Sure, why not?
translation: 再来一盘？哈，为什么不呢？

original: How about another game of Caravan?
translation: 再来一盘怎么样？

original: I haven't been through Utah recently - what's the situation like?
translation: 我最近没有去过犹他州，那里情况怎么样？

original: Well, it ain't good, I'll tell you that. It's not like the Mojave or the NCR - hell, even Arizona under Caesar is safer.
translation: 呃，我得说，不是很好。那里一点也不像莫哈维或NCR这样安全，对，甚至凯撒占领的亚利桑那州都更安全。

original: You got raiders all over the damn place, tribes of degenerates that'll eat you as soon as look at you, regional warlords... the works.
translation: 那个受诅咒的地方到处都是贪婪的掠夺者，野蛮的部落，还有区域性质的军阀。简直就是一团糟。

original: Not too many decent places to stop and trade. New Canaan's one of the only ones left I know about.
translation: 没有什么合适的地方可以落脚做生意，新迦南是我知道的唯一一个地方。

original: I understand this caravan is headed to Zion. What can you tell me about the area?
translation: 我听说这支商队要前往锡安，你能跟我说说那个地方的情况吗？

original: Well, I ain't never been inside, myself. Did some trading with the New Canaanites from their mission there, but that was all on the outskirts.
translation: 好吧，实际上我也从来没进去过。我们之前只是在锡安近郊一带与在那里传教的新迦南人做些贸易。

original: All the old ways in and out were destroyed after the War, but we got ourselves the location of a pass the New Canaanites use - that's our way in.
translation: 所有可以进出的路线在战后都被摧毁，但我们现在还是找到一条新迦南人用过的小道，可以走他们的路进去。

original: That's why I wanted someone with a Pip-Boy on the caravan - the map'll be helpful for checking the topography, keeping us on the trail.
translation: 这就是我为什么要找一个有哔哔小子的家伙。那上面的地图可以让我们在茂密的森林和广袤的群山中不会迷路。

original: What can you tell me about New Canaan?
translation: 你能不能跟我讲讲新迦南？

original: Don't know much about the place, but I can tell you about the people. The New Canaanites were some kind of religious group from before the War.
translation: 我对这个地方了解不多，但我对那里的人算是知道一点。新迦南人在战前即是有某种宗教性质的团体。

original: They control the old city of Ogden, a ways north of Zion, and they got themselves a nice defensible mission in the canyon itself - or they did.
translation: 他们控制着一座老城奥格登，一条从北面通往锡安的路。他们在山谷里成功实施了布教，锡安成了他们防御性的一道屏障。

original: They trade a fair bit with the tribes in Zion - well, the ones that don't try and kill them, anyways.
translation: 他们与锡安的部落做了很多贸易，嗯，是与那些不会试图杀死他们的部落。

original: Tell me about Happy Trails Caravan Company.
translation: 跟我谈谈关于“欢乐小径”商队公司的事儿。

original: We're a smaller company out of Sac-Town, up in the northern part of the NCR. We run some business through New Reno, there on the "Little Loop."
translation: 我们是位于NCR北面的萨克城外的一家小公司。我们在新里诺做点小生意，“小环路”上。

original: Had a nice run to Salt Lake City, too - but then we lost contact with New Canaan, and that went all to hell.
translation: 去盐湖城也很顺利。但自从我们失去了和新迦南的联系，我们的生意就一落千丈。

original: Heh. All right, I'll believe you - Lord knows I ain't going to pat you down to find out for myself.
translation: 呵呵，那好，我相信你。上帝知道我不会亲自去搜你的身的。

original: Don't worry about me. I'm used to finding out-of-the-way places to stuff my gear.
translation: 别担心我，我总是会想方设法地合理利用我的背包空间的。

original: Heh. I do believe you could.
translation: 呵呵，我相信你可以。

original: Not only could I carry my own gear, I could carry yours, his, and one of your brahmins'.
translation: 我不仅可以背自己的行李，你的、他的、婆罗门的我一起背都没问题。

original: Who were those tribals who attacked me?
translation: 那些攻击我们的部落是什么人？

original: White Legs - nasty bunch. They been raiding deeper into Zion ever since New Canaan was wiped out.
translation: 白腿部落，这帮畜生。自从新迦南被消灭以后，他们一直在渗入锡安。

original: Tell me more about Joshua Graham.
translation: 跟我说说约书亚·格拉汉姆。

original: He's been the chief of our tribe since he came back to the Valley. He went off to the civilized world years ago, to fight a war. That didn't go well.
translation: 自从他回到这片山谷以来，他就一直是我们部落的酋长。他多年前去了文明世界，去打仗了。据说结果不怎么样。

original: Why do you need a map of Grand Staircase?
translation: 你为什么需要大阶梯的地图？

original: Grand Staircase is farther east, deeper into the Colorado Plateau.
translation: 大阶梯在更远的东面，直接深入科罗拉多高原。

original: The White Legs were able to reach us here, but it's only because Zion is close to the Long 15. They can't pursue us east of here. It's too wild.
translation: 白腿部落能在这里找到我们，是因为锡安靠近15号高速公路。但往东他们就来不了了，那里完全是荒蛮之地。

original: Throughout our history, we have called many places Zion. This valley is full of God's beauty, but it's just a place. Zion is more than this.
translation: 纵观我们的历史，我们把很多地方都称为锡安。这片峡谷充满了上帝的赞誉，但它只是一个地方而已，锡安不止于此。

original: We cannot use any and all means available just to protect stone and water and a piece of sky. We have to hold on to our faith. Far more enduring.
translation: 我们不能仅仅为了保护石头、水和一片天空而使用任何可能的手段。我们只能坚守我们的信仰，并持之以恒。

original: If we sacrifice grace for a piece of land, we may live in this valley, but we will no longer dwell in Zion. It's better for us to leave now.
translation: 如果我们为了一小片土地牺牲我们的荣誉，我们可以住在这个山谷，但我们永远也无法在扎根于锡安。离开这里，对我们或许会更好。

original: Take all I have.
translation: 把我有的都拿走吧。

original: Your generosity is...  well, I just can't thank you enough.
translation: 你的慷慨...好吧，我的任何言辞也表达不了我对你的感激之情。

original: Here's one healing powder.
translation: 这是一份治疗粉。

original: Thanks. Even one dose can make a difference.
translation: 谢谢。即使只有一份也是莫大的帮助。

original: Is there any other way I can help the Sorrows?
translation: 还有什么别的办法可以帮助悲恸部落吗？

original: If you could part with it, healing powder would be welcome. We have enough Stimpaks for now, but we can't rely on that small supply.
translation: 如果可以的话，我们欢迎多来些医疗粉。我们现在已经有了足够的治疗针，但我们依赖那少量的补给。

original: Broc and Xander plants can be found throughout the valley and you might even find some on White Legs you come across.
translation: 布洛克花和山德根在这片峡谷里到处都是，而且你会经常“偶遇”些白腿部落的人。

original: You mentioned you need healing powder. I have some, if you're still interested.
translation: 我记得你说过需要些治疗粉。如果你还感兴趣的话，我这里有一些。

original: That's great news. We can use anything you can offer.
translation: 这可真是好消息！你提供的任何东西我们都能用。

original: Come on, down this path. We're almost there.
translation: 沿着这条小道，继续走。我们马上就到了。

original: Holy hell, it's the White Legs! What are they doing this far south?
translation: 操，是白腿！他们跑到这么南边干什么？

original: Let's end this, then.
translation: 那就结束这一切吧。

original: Ha! Yes, end!
translation: 哈！好，结束！

original: Then see how strong my spears are, warrior.
translation: 那我就让你好好见识见识我的长矛有多锐利，勇士。

original: This good fight will be!
translation: 这是一场精彩的战斗！

original: Daniel and the Sorrows are weak prey, not fit for such mighty warriors.
translation: 丹尼尔和悲恸部落根本就是软弱的猎物，比你的这些强悍的战士要差得远。

original: Sorrows are weak. We go, find true warriors to test us!
translation: 悲恸部落太软弱了。我们走，去找些真正的勇士来考验我们！

original: I've already crushed your warriors. Retreat now and rebuild your tribe, or die in obscurity.
translation: 我已经击溃了你的部队。要么滚回去，要么就死在这里。

original: ...I go. But rebuild my tribe, and come we back stronger than before!
translation: ...我走。但我回去后一定会重建我的部落，等我们再回来时会比以前更强大！

original: Well, all of the Bighorners are dead. Problem solved!
translation: 好了，所有的大角羊都死了。问题解决了！

original: That's... not really what I was hoping for. I guess... I guess at least we don't have to worry about the Bighorners attacking the camp now. Hoy....
translation: 这...完全不是我希望的。我猜...我至少不用担心这些动物会再攻击我的部落了。唉...

original: Well, I returned the calf to its herd. Had to kill a few Bighorners to do it, though.
translation: 好了，我已经把小羊带回到它的群落了。但途中不得已杀了几只大角羊。

original: Sure, hey, I understand. I wish it could have been done different, but at least the calf is back with its herd.
translation: 好的，嘿，我可以理解。虽然我希望你能做的更好，但至少现在小羊已经安全了。

original: Well, I returned the calf to its mother, and didn't even kill any of the Bighorners.
translation: 好了，我把小羊带回到它妈妈身边了。而且我一只大角羊也没杀。

original: Hoo! Glad to hear it! That'll be some happy mama, huh? Thank you - really. It means a lot to me.
translation: 哦！太好了！！它妈妈一定会很高兴的，对吧？谢谢你...真的。我高兴得真不知道说什么好了。

original: That sounds like way too much work. Maybe later.
translation: 听起来好像很麻烦，晚点再说吧。

original: Oh sure, that's just what the hunters said. Well... I guess let me know if you change your mind.
translation: 噢当然，那只是猎人说的。嗯...如果你改变主意了就告诉我。

original: All right, I'll look into it.
translation: 好的，我会注意的。

original: That's great! I'll help any way I can.
translation: 好极了！如果需要帮助尽管说。

original: Maybe I can help with that.
translation: 或许我可以帮忙。

original: Yeah? Hey, thanks - most of the hunters don't listen when I tell them the problem.
translation: 是吗？嘿，谢谢，大部分猎人听不进我说的问题。

original: Just one thing - try not to kill any Bighorners if you can, yeah? You'll drive the herd off, and we'll have to range farther on our hunts.
translation: 只有一点：尽量不要伤害任何大角羊，好吗？否则兽群会被你吓跑，这样我们就得往更远的地方打猎了。

original: Tell me a little about this area - any interesting wildlife?
translation: 给我介绍一下这个地区，有什么有趣的野生动物吗？

original: Mostly it's the mountain Bighorners - whole herd of them up on the cliffs there. Usually they're not too aggressive, but lately... hoo!
translation: 这里大部分动物是山地大角羊，他们生活在山上和悬崖边。通常他们并没有攻击性，但最近...唉。

original: My guess is one of the calves got lost somewhere along the way. Bighorners are communal - one missing calf, and the whole herd gets ornery.
translation: 我猜，它们有一头小羊在山里迷路了。大角羊是群居的，一只小羊不见了，整个羊群都会变得暴躁。

original: If that calf doesn't turn up soon, they might very well come down into the valley and attack the camp.
translation: 如果那只小羊再不出现的话，它们可能会冲下山谷，进攻我们的营地。

original: You change your mind about helping out?
translation: 你改变主意要帮忙了吗？

original: So, about those Bighorners....
translation: 那么，关于那些大角羊...

original: Mostly it's the mountain Bighorners - whole herd of them up on the cliffs there. Usually they're not too aggressive, but lately... hoo!
translation: 这里大部分动物是山地大角羊，他们生活在山上和悬崖边。通常他们并没有攻击性，但最近...唉。

original: My guess is one of the calves got lost somewhere along the way. Bighorners are communal - one missing calf, and the whole herd gets ornery.
translation: 我猜，它们有一头小羊在山里迷路了。大角羊是群居的，一只小羊不见了，整个羊群都会变得暴躁。

original: If that calf doesn't turn up soon, they might very well come down into the valley and attack the camp.
translation: 如果那只小羊再不出现的话，它们可能会冲下山谷，进攻我们的营地。

original: You might try luring the baby out with some banana yucca. These Bighorners go crazy for the stuff.
translation: 你可以试试用一些香蕉丝兰把小羊羔引出来，那些大角羊对这种植物非常着迷。

original: Tell me about the Bighorner problem again.
translation: 把大角羊的问题再跟我说一遍。

original: I'll do what I can, but I need to defend myself if I'm attacked.
translation: 我会尽我所能，但如果我受到攻击，我需要保护自己。

original: Of course you do - I understand. You know, I heard stories about rangers from Back When - they carried lightning sticks that stunned the animals.
translation: 你当然可以，我理解的。我听说过不少“原初时代”的护林员的故事，他们拿着带电的棍子，可以击昏动物。

original: I've never been to any of the Back When places, but they might have left one when they died.
translation: 我从来没有去过“原初时代”的那些地方，但他们死了以后可能还会留下一个。

original: You might also try luring the baby out with some banana yucca - the mountain Bighorners love the stuff.
translation: 你可以试试用一些香蕉丝兰把小羊羔引出来，山地大角羊喜欢这种东西。

original: What can I do to help?
translation: 我能帮你做什么？

original: I don't have time for this. Go away.
translation: 我现在忙得很，走开。

original: Lah, I meant no offense - if you won't talk to me, talk to Joshua Graham - he's at our camp on the Eastern Virgin.
translation: 啊，我无意冒犯，如果你不想跟我说话，请找约书亚·格拉汉姆，他就在我们位于东维琴河的营地那里。

original: Civilized lands? What do you mean?
translation: 文明的土地？什么意思？

original: I mean the Lands Beyond the Valley - the place where the cities never fell. Where people don't live in tribes and forage just to survive.
translation: 我意思是这片山谷之外的土地，城市没有沦陷的地方。那里的人们不再以部落的形式生活，也不再仅仅为了生存而觅食。

original: Joshua keeps saying it isn't paradise out there, but how can it not be, compared to this?
translation: 约书亚一直说外面不是天堂，但和这里比起来，怎么可能不是呢？

original: Sorry, I'm getting distracted - Joshua will want to know about you - please, go to our camp on the Eastern Virgin. Tell him how you came to be here.
translation: 对不起，我有点分心了，约书亚会想知道你的事的，请到我们位于东维琴河的营地去。然后请告诉他你是怎么来的。

original: Who is this Joshua?
translation: 谁是约书亚？

original: Joshua Graham - he leads our tribe. Thanks to him, the Dead Horses are strong, and safe from our enemies.
translation: 约书亚·格拉汉姆，他是我们部落的酋长。正因为他，我们死马部落才变得强大，才不会受到敌人的伤害。

original: He'll want to talk to anyone coming up from south-ways. Guess that means just you, now. Come, I can take you to him.
translation: 他会想和任何从南方来的人谈谈。我猜现在只剩你了，来吧，我带你去见他。

original: Wait, what about Caesar?
translation: 等等，凯撒呢？

original: When Joshua first came to us, he was servant to a man he called Caesar. He led his master's armies, and we were ready to follow him into war.
translation: 我们第一次见到约书亚的时候，他还是一名叫凯撒的人的手下。他带领着他主人的军队，同时我们也准备好跟随他参加战争。

original: Then he lost his master's army to a tribe called Enseeyar, the Sunset People. When he returned, he was as you saw him - burned, broken, but changed.
translation: 然后他被一个叫“恩西阿“的日落人部落打败了。当他回来的时候，正如你所见...他被烧得面目全非。

original: He led us away from Caesar, led us to our own destiny in Zion.
translation: 他带着我们远离了凯撒军团，带领我们在锡安找到了自己的命运。

original: Why is it so important that we fight the White Legs?
translation: 为什么要和白腿部落对抗？

original: Well... because they're our enemies. What else would we do? They take our land, they kill our scouts, they poach our hunting grounds.
translation: 呃...因为他们是我们的敌人。我们还能做什么？他们抢了我们的土地，杀了我们的侦察兵，还入侵我们的狩猎区。

original: What's with the shell casings in your club?
translation: 你战棍上的弹壳是什么？

original: We decorate our clubs with them to honor Joshua Graham. They were the weapons of his old tribe, so now they are ours.
translation: 我们用这些装饰表达我们对约书亚·格拉汉姆的尊敬。它们本来是他以前所在部落的武器，现在我们继承了下来。

original: Can't say they seem that dangerous to me, but Joshua says they "won the West."
translation: 我不敢说这有多危险，但约书亚说它们可以“称雄西部”。

original: What do you know about the New Canaanites?
translation: 你对新迦南人了解多少？

original: Little bit. I met some of their missionaries a few times, but I've never been to their city. Joshua could tell you more - or Daniel, I imagine.
translation: 只了解一点儿。我曾见过几次他们的传教士，但我从来没去过他们所在的城市。约书亚会告诉你更多信息的，丹尼尔或许也可以。

original: Do you remember anything about Joshua from before he became your leader?
translation: 你还记得约书亚成为你们酋长之前的事吗？

original: Only a little - I was very young. He was... different. Prouder, yes, but harder, crueler, more driven. Really, I was terrified of him. We all were.
translation: 只记得一点点...那时我还小。他...与现在差别很大，更骄傲，没错，但更强硬，更残忍，更有行动力。说实话，那时的我对他非常害怕，我们都是。

original: When he came back, I almost didn't believe he was the same man. He was humbler. He wanted to protect, not destroy.
translation: 当他回来的时候，我几乎不相信他还是原来的那个人。他更谦逊了，所有行为的出发点都是出于保护，而不再是破坏。

original: What did Joshua do for you?
translation: 约书亚为你做了什么吗？

original: If it wasn't for Joshua, the Dead Horses would still be the whipping boys of the Zion Valley.
translation: 如果不是约书亚，死马部落还会是锡安山谷的出气筒。

original: He taught us how to hold our territory, to protect ourselves. He guided us away from Caesar, and showed us how Caesar would have destroyed us.
translation: 他教会我们怎样坚守自己的土地，怎样保护自己。他引导我们远离凯撒，告诉我们凯撒会如何毁灭我们。

original: Tell me about your tribe.
translation: 跟我谈谈你的部落。

original: We came up in the Land of the Dead Horse, though why the Back When folks called it that I got no hint.
translation: 我们来到了“死马之地”，不过我不知道为什么人们叫它“原初时代”。

original: We raided, we fought... we lost. Our enemies drove us back into Zion, and we would have died if it hadn't been for Joshua. Joshua, and his Caesar.
translation: 我们突袭，我们战斗...但我们失败了。我们的敌人把我们驱赶到锡安，要不是约书亚，我们早就死光了。约书亚，还有他的凯撒。

original: What are all those tattoos?
translation: 那些纹身是什么意思？

original: Dead Horses mark ourselves to commemorate our hunts. When a hunter takes a great beast, or when a youth goes on his first hunt, he gets a tattoo.
translation: 我们死马部落用来纹身来纪念我们的狩猎果实。当一个猎人捕获一头巨兽，或者当一个年轻人第一次打猎时，就会得到一个纹身。

original: I see. That's fascinating.
translation: 我知道了，真是太令人着迷了。

original: I'm sure Daniel could tell you more. His knowledge of the Father is greater than my own.
translation: 我想丹尼尔肯定能告诉你更多，他对先父的了解比我要多得多。

original: That doesn't sound like what I've heard about the New Canaanites....
translation: 这听起来和我所知道的关于新迦南人的信息好像不太一样...

original: Perhaps you do not fully understand the New Canaanites. I have seen the Father's images.
translation: 也许其实你并不了解新迦南人，我见过先父的形象。

original: His holy bride and holy son were given unto the world to save it. They dwelt in the caverns of the mountains, caverns which can still be seen today.
translation: 他圣洁的新娘和神圣的儿子被派来拯救这个世界。他们住在山上的洞穴里，这些洞穴至今仍可见。

original: The people sinned against Him, and were punished with the End That Came in Fire and the loss of the holy tongue. Only the New Canaanites were spared.
translation: 人们得罪了他，就遭受了惩罚，结局就是被烈火焚烧，圣言也归于无有。只有新迦南人得以幸免。

original: Wait, you think the survivalist is... God?
translation: 等等，你认为那个生存狂...是上帝？

original: I do not know this "survivalist," but the Father in the Caves is the god of the New Canaanites.
translation: 我不认识这个什么“生存狂”，但洞中的先父就是新迦南人的神。

original: I have seen the holy books, and once I even saw an image of the holy child and his mother.
translation: 我看过圣书，有一次我甚至看到了圣婴和他母亲的图像。

original: Do not the New Canaanites' books say the Father gave the world his child?
translation: 新迦南人的书不是说先父将他的孩子赐给世人吗?

original: Do you have any family?
translation: 你有家庭吗？

original: I do. A fine husband and three children. I miss them each day, but I take comfort in knowing they are safe.
translation: 有，一个亲切的丈夫和三个可爱的孩子。我每天都会思念他们，只要一想到他们现在很安全，我就会很欣慰。

original: Tell me more about your tribe.
translation: 跟我谈谈你的部落。

original: We have dwelt in the Narrows since the End That Came In Fire, when the Father in the Caves punished the world and made us forget the holy tongue.
translation: 自末日之火降临以来，我们就一直住在狭路地带，当时洞中的先父惩罚了世界，让我们忘记了圣语。

original: We have had good relations with the other tribes in the valley. At least, before Salt-Upon-Wounds brought his White Legs here.
translation: 在山谷里，我们和其他几个部落都保持着良好的关系。但在伤口撒盐带着白腿部落来后，一切都改变了。

original: We have Daniel to thank for our continued existence. His advice and help has kept the White Legs from overrunning us so far.
translation: 由于丹尼尔，我们才能活到今天。在他的建议和帮助下，白腿部落至今还没有把我们打倒。

original: I do not know how long even he can protect us, though.
translation: 但我不知道他还能保护我们多久。

original: Who or what is the Father in the Cave?
translation: 那个住在洞里的“先父”是谁？

original: Have you not heard of the god of the New Canaanites? He is our protector and our judge. He helped our ancestors find their place here in Zion.
translation: 你难道没听说过新迦南人的上帝吗？他是我们的保护者和审判者，他帮助我们的祖先在锡安找到了立足之地。

original: He gave us many gifts, but we are not to seek him out. His caves are forbidden to us. Those who seek them out are taken from us.
translation: 他给了我们很多礼物，但我们不会去打扰他。他住的洞穴对我们来说就是禁地，那些想寻找他的人早已被我们赶走。

original: Give me some info on this Daniel. Who is he?
translation: 跟我说说那个丹尼尔是谁？

original: Daniel is a wise man, and a great friend to the Sorrows. He taught me to speak the language of New Canaan - the English from the holy books.
translation: 丹尼尔是一个智者，也是悲恸部落伟大的朋友。他教我说新迦南的语言，就是圣书中的英语。

original: What's your deal?
translation: 介绍一下你自己？

original: Waking Cloud is my name. I am midwife to the Sorrows. It sounds ill-omened, no? "Midwife to sorrows."
translation: 我的名字叫唤醒白云，我是悲恸部落的接生婆。听起来是不是有点不吉利？“接生悲恸。”

original: Nothing else. Talk to you later.
translation: 没什么了，回头再说。

original: Go with fortune, friend.
translation: 祝你好运，朋友。

original: That's all I wanted to know for now.
translation: 目前我就想知道这些。

original: Then I will look forward to our next speaking.
translation: 好，我们下次可以谈点别的了。

original: I had other questions.
translation: 我有几个问题。

original: Certainly. I am happy to share my knowledge.
translation: 好啊，我很愿意分享我的知识。

original: About your husband... I'm afraid he was killed by White Legs during the evacuation.
translation: 关于你的丈夫...恐怕，他在撤离的时候已经被白腿部落杀害了。

original: What? No... you must be mistaken. Daniel would have told me!
translation: 什么？不...你一定是弄错了，丹尼尔会告诉我的！

original: Safe? Where are they?
translation: 安全？他们在哪儿？

original: When we learned that Salt-Upon-Wounds had defiled Zion with his presence, Daniel ordered the children, the old, and the sick evacuated from the camp.
translation: 当我们得知伤口撒盐的人已经用他们的存在玷污了锡安之后，丹尼尔命令所有的小孩、老人和病人优先撤离营地。

original: My husband volunteered to lead the hunters that went with them for protection.
translation: 我的丈夫志愿带领着一队猎手，一路保护他们。

original: I try not to worry about them, but we have had no news for so long, and Daniel seems sad when I ask him about it. Sad... and a little frightened.
translation: 我试着不去担心他们，但我们和他们失去联系已经有很长时间了。当我问起丹尼尔时，他似乎很伤心，悲伤...而且有一丝惊恐。

original: What do you do when you're not delivering babies?
translation: 你不接生孩子的时候都做些什么？

original: I tend to other hurts and sicknesses that afflict our tribe. I also scout the valley for the herbs I use in my medicines.
translation: 我关心其他折磨我们部落的伤痛和疾病，有时我也会到山谷里采集些药草。

original: Midwife? I haven't seen any children around.
translation: 接生婆？那附近怎么一个孩子也没有？

original: The children and the old have already been evacuated from the camp. They are safe enough, unless the White Legs come for us in force.
translation: 孩子和老人都已经撤走了。他们很安全，除非白腿大军来找我们。

original: Have you known him long?
translation: 你以前就认识他？

original: Six years. He attended the birth of my third child. It was a hard birth. The River nearly carried my water to the Father, and my child's with it.
translation: 我们认识6年了，他见证了我第三个孩子的出生。那一次很艰难，湍急的河流差一点就带着我和我的孩子去见“先父”了。

original: Daniel knew the ways of New Canaan's medicine. He stepped in and saved both of our lives.
translation: 丹尼尔懂些新迦南的医术。他倾尽全力，救下了我和孩子的生命。

original: After the birth, I asked Daniel if he would teach me what he knew of childbirth. He agreed, and so here I am.
translation: 孩子出生后，我问丹尼尔是否愿意教我他所知道的分娩知识。他同意了，于是我就是现在这个样子了。

original: Holy books?
translation: 圣书？

original: Yes - the language of the New Canaanites is the holy tongue, for it is the language their sacred books are written in.
translation: 是的，新迦南人的语言是圣语，因为他们的圣书是用这种语言写成的。

original: The Father in the Caves brought it to them after the Judgment, but the ancestors of the Sorrows sinned against Him. They were denied the true tongue.
translation: “先父”在审判日后把这些带给我们，但悲恸部落的先祖违背了他。他们被剥夺了说圣语的权利。

original: You're right. Now, what are you going to do about it?
translation: 你说得对。现在，你打算怎么办？

original: About Daniel... I don't yet know. But I am a woman of the Sorrows, and I will have restitution for my husband.
translation: 关于丹尼尔...我还不知道。但我是悲恸部落的女人，我必须为我的丈夫报仇。

original: I agree. It was arrogant and cruel - not exactly the kind of thing a friend would do.
translation: 我很赞同。这件事他做得实在是太傲慢和无情了，一点也不像一个朋友的样子。

original: Arrogant... yes. I thought Daniel respected me, saw the Sorrows as his equals... but he manipulates us for his own ends.
translation: 傲慢...对！我原来一直以为丹尼尔很尊重我，视整个悲恸部落为他的兄弟手足...但他却为了自己的目的操纵我们牺牲我们。

original: He was only doing what he thought was best for the tribe. It wasn't an easy choice for him.
translation: 他只是做了他认为对整个部落最正确的事。对他来说做出这样的选择其实很不轻松。

original: Perhaps... I will have to have a very long talk with Daniel when all of this is over. Thank you for telling me this truth.
translation: 也许吧...但等到一切结束后，我必须跟他好好谈一谈。谢谢你告诉我真相。

original: I'm afraid so. Daniel kept it from you because he thought the grief would distract you.
translation: 恐怕的确是这样的。丹尼尔不告诉你，是因为他怕你因为悲伤而分心。

original: How... how dare he? What gives him the right? I thought Daniel was my friend, but he cares nothing for the Sorrows!
translation: 什么？他居然...谁给他的这个权利？我一直把丹尼尔当朋友，但他一点也不关心我们！

original: Let's talk more later.
translation: 我们回头再聊。

original: Until then.
translation: 好的。

original: That's all for now, but I'll be back.
translation: 那先这样吧，我之后会回来的。

original: Yeah, reckon you will.
translation: 是的，我估计你会的。

original: I understand. I'll respect your beliefs, then, but we need to search the cave.
translation: 我知道了。我会尊重你们的信仰，但我们必须要搜查这个洞穴。

original: I understand. I would prefer to leave as soon as possible, though.
translation: 我明白了。不过，我还是想尽快离开。

original: The Father in the Caves was just a man who lived a long time ago.
translation: 在这洞里的先父只不过是一个生活在很久以前的人。

original: You speak as one who has not heard the tales, who has not seen the sacred images. If you knew, you would not mock.
translation: 你说的话就像一个没有听过传说，没有见过圣像的人。你什么都不懂，请不要乱说话。

original: Holy wrath. Right. I'll keep an eye out for that. Bet it looks a lot like a bear trap.
translation: 够了够了，好，我会多留个心眼的。这看起来倒挺像个捕熊陷阱的。

original: Do not mock that which you do not know! Such talk can only anger the Father.
translation: 不要嘲笑那些你不了解的东西！这只会激起先父的愤怒。

original: I don't have time for your religious superstitions. It's just a cave, that's all.
translation: 我没时间听你的宗教迷信。这只是个洞，就这样。

original: It is a holy place! If we go any deeper, we will suffer for it!
translation: 这是神圣之地！如果我们继续深入，我们会为此付出代价的！

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你在说什么？

original: The Father in the Caves! The Holy Father who gave the Sorrows His succor and gave the New Canaanites His son!
translation: 洞穴里的先父！神圣的先父拯救了悲恸部落，把他的孩子赐给了新迦南人！

original: Many of the caves around the valley are sacred to him, and those who would trespass are punished by holy wrath!
translation: 这片峡谷的大部分洞穴都是属于他的，任何胆敢入侵的人都会受到神圣之怒的惩罚！

original: We should not be here! This place... it belongs to the Father in the Caves! We must not profane it with our touch!
translation: 我们不该来这个地方！这里...属于洞中的先父！我们不能玷污亵渎这个圣地！

original: How would we do that?
translation: 我们该怎么办？

original: Did Daniel not give you some of the New Canaanites' fire clay? That could easily collapse a cave and trap the beasts inside.
translation: 难道丹尼尔没有给你一些“新迦南的火粘土”？那些玩意可以很轻松地塌陷一个洞穴，把野兽困在里面。

original: Look around and see if you can find a cave nearby. It may prove easier than slaying the beasts.
translation: 附近找找，看我们能不能找到洞穴。我得说，这比单纯的屠杀要容易多了。

original: I'll be sure to tell Daniel to bring some bear-monster-thing snacks, then.
translation: 我要告诉丹尼尔，让他多准备些“熊怪小餐点”。

original: We'd better get to work then.
translation: 我们最好现在就开始行动。

original: I stand with you.
translation: 我支持你。

original: Big deal, I've killed worse.
translation: 没什么大不了的，我杀过更狠的。

original: I hope that is truth, and not a boast. But I will respect your leadership.
translation: 希望你没吹牛。但我还是会尊重你的指挥。

original: What do you propose?
translation: 你有什么建议？

original: Fighting so many at once is a dangerous prospect, unless you are a truly mighty warrior.
translation: 一次挑战多只妖怪确实有些风险，除非你是名真正的勇士。

original: This many so close together suggests a nest nearby - if we find it and destroy it, we might have better luck.
translation: 这里聚集着这么多，附近一定有个巢穴。如果我们能找到巢穴并及时将它摧毁，幸运的天平或许还会站在我们这一边。

original: Let's take care of it then.
translation: 那我们去解决它吧。

original: As you say.
translation: 如你所说。

original: These traps must have come from somewhere - I bet the White Legs who placed them are still around.
translation: 这些陷阱一定是最近才布置的，我觉得白腿部落的人应该还在附近。

original: I would suspect you are right. Perhaps we should try to find them before they lay more traps?
translation: 我估计差不多。或许我们应该在他们布置更多陷阱前先找到他们？

original: What should we do about it?
translation: 我们该做些什么？

original: Disarm the traps if you can - or find the White Legs who placed them and drive them off.
translation: 尽可能地解除这些陷阱，或找到设置它们的白腿部落。

original: Our advance scouts should be able to deal with them if they don't have to fight off raiders at the same time.
translation: 我们的高级侦察兵因为要对付掠夺者而无法分身。

original: Okay then, let's get down there and take care of business.
translation: 好，我们出发，争取早点干净利落地把他们解决掉。

original: I will follow your command - but I advise caution if it is possible.
translation: 我会听从你的指挥，但我建议请随时保持谨慎。

original: So the totems are sacred to them somehow? Good to know.
translation: 所以利用图腾可以对他们产生奇效。好极了。

original: Yes. If their war totems were to... "disappear," they would likely lose the will to fight.
translation: 是的。如果他们的战争图腾...“消失”，他们可能会失去战斗的意志。

original: Any advice on how to deal with the situation?
translation: 你对于应付现在这个局面有什么建议？

original: You might rush them and take them by surprise. We would be badly outnumbered then, though, and these will be strong fighters.
translation: 你可以对他们发动突然袭击，给他们一个惊喜。尽管我们初期火力占优，但随后我们人数上的劣势会成为严重的短板。

original: We might also use their superstition against them. White Leg warriors believe that to lose their totems on the eve of battle is a terrible omen.
translation: 我们也可以利用他们的迷信来对付他们。白腿部落的战士们相信，在战斗前夕失去图腾是一个可怕的预兆。

original: Yao Guai - even our strongest hunters could not hope to kill so many. There must be a nest nearby.
translation: 妖怪...即使我们最强悍的猎人也不可能杀死这么多，在这附近一定有个巢穴。

original: This is the only sure path from the Narrows to Pine Creek! They will be cut to ribbons by these traps!
translation: 这是通往松溪的唯一通道，这些陷阱可以让任何试图闯入的生命有来无回。

original: Those tents down there - that is a White Leg war camp. Do you see the war totems they've erected around the tents?
translation: 那些帐篷，就是白腿部落的战争营地。你看到他们在帐篷周围竖起的战争图腾了吗？

original: White Leg warriors pray to them for strength and savagery before battle. This is no raiding band.
translation: 白腿战士在战斗前会向它们祈祷以获得力量和野性。这不是突击小队。

original: All right, let's go.
translation: 好的，走吧。

original: Goot sists. We head east, then. Joshua is at our tribe's camp in the Eastern Virgin.
translation: 很好。接下来我们要向东走，约书亚在我们位于东维琴河的部落营地那里。

original: You'd be surprised what "civilized" tribes will fight over.
translation: 你要是了解这些“文明部落”的好战本性，你一定会很惊讶。

original: Now you sound like Joshua. He always tells me the tribal life is better, that I should stay here and forget the outside world.
translation: 你现在说的话听起来像约书亚。他总是跟我说，部落的原始生活才是最好的，我应该呆在这里，忘掉外面的世界。

original: Small? Have you ever seen Hoover Dam? It's bigger than some of these mountains.
translation: 小？你有没有见过胡佛大坝啊？它比这些群山还要大得多。

original: Hah! ...Really? That's... my gods. Must be some mighty civilized folks who built that.
translation: 哈哈！...真的？哦，这...我的天啊。一定是强大的文明人建造的。

original: The only recent war I know of is when Caesar's Legion attacked Hoover Dam. Is that where he fought?
translation: 我所知道的最近一场战争，是凯撒军团进攻胡佛大坝。莫非他也参加了？

original: I don't know, he doesn't talk about it much. Maybe - but how can two civilized tribes fight over something as small as a dam?
translation: 我不知道，他不怎么说这事。也许...但是我不明白，为什么两个文明部落会围绕一个小水坝打得不可开交？

original: What happened to him?
translation: 他怎么了？

original: Well, before he left, he didn't have those bandages all over his face. That tell you something?
translation: 嗯，在他走前，他脸上还没有那些绷带。你明白了吗？

original: You see his face, you'll understand.
translation: 你看看他那张脸，你就明白了。

original: Typical. Just when I get a useful minion....
translation: 不出所料，刚得到个有用的奴才...

original: Hey, it's not my fault! And what's this "minion" stuff? Dahs eet - see you around, "civilized" man.
translation: 嘿，这不是我的过错！还有，“奴才”是什么意思？就这样了，再见，你这个“有教养”的家伙。

original: Hey, it's not my fault! And what's this "minion" stuff? Dahs eet - see you around, "civilized" woman.
translation: 嘿，这不是我的过错！还有，“奴才”是什么意思？就这样了，再见，你这个“有教养”的女人。

original: Give my regards to Joshua, then.
translation: 那么替我向约书亚传达我的问候。

original: I will. Goot gonen, ahk iss.
translation: 我会的。再见了，我的朋友。

original: Are you sure? You've been a useful companion so far.
translation: 你确定？到现在为止，对我来说你一直都是个尽职尽责的好同伴。

original: Sorry - Joshua was pretty clear. Get you to Daniel, then come on home. You can take it up with him if you'd like.
translation: 不好意思，约书亚的态度相当明确：带你去见丹尼尔，然后回家。不过如果你高兴的话，以后你有机会可以和他一起迎接挑战。

original: No way, pal. I'm not traipsing around the desert with a barbarian who doesn't wear pants.
translation: 没门，伙计。我才不会和一个连裤子都不穿的原始人一起在沙漠里游荡。

original: I don't think he'll like that answer much. You change your mind, I'll be around the Dead Horses camp. Goot gonen.
translation: 我觉得他不会喜欢这个回答的。如果你改变主意，你可以随时在死马部落营地附近找到我。再见。

original: I could use a guide. Let's go.
translation: 你可以做我的向导。我们走吧。

original: Goot! I really wasn't looking forward to talking to Joshua if you turned me down.
translation: 好的！如果你拒绝我，我真不知道该怎么面对约书亚。

original: Hey... as long as we're traveling together, think you could help me out with a little wildlife problem?
translation: 嘿，正好我们一起走着，你能不能帮我解决一个与野生动物有关的问题？

original: Let's move then.
translation: 我们走吧。

original: Who is this Joshua?
translation: 谁是约书亚？

original: Joshua Graham - he leads our tribe. Thanks to him, the Dead Horses are strong, and safe from our enemies.
translation: 约书亚·格拉汉姆，他是我们部落的酋长。正因为他，我们死马部落才变得强大，才不会受到敌人的伤害。

original: I'm sure he will want to talk to you. You can find him just south of here, in the Angel Cave.
translation: 我肯定他急切地想见你，你可以在南面的天使洞穴找到他。

original: White Legs? Who are they?
translation: 白腿部落？他们是谁？

original: Nasty bunch of raiders from up by Great Salt Lake. White Legs killed your friends at the Southern Passage.
translation: 从大盐湖来的一帮掠夺者。是他们杀了和你一起同行的伙伴。

original: Not many survive White Leg raids - not even by running. Joshua will want to hear about what happened to you.
translation: 没有多少人能从白腿部落的袭击下幸存下来。甚至逃跑都没有。约书亚或许会对你的事感兴趣。

original: I had no reason to stay for that fight.
translation: 我没理由留下来打这场仗。

original: But... they were White Legs! The enemy! You are a very strange outsider, but I think Joshua will want to speak to you anyways.
translation: 但...他们是白腿部落的人！他们是敌人！你真是个非常奇怪的外来者，我想约书亚会跟你说的。

original: Okay, I'll go talk to him.
translation: 好的，那我去问他。

original: I won't keep you. Maybe we talk again after.
translation: 我不耽误你时间了，也许之后我们可以再谈。

original: Hang on, I want to know more about what's going on.
translation: 等等，我想搞清楚究竟发生了什么？

original: Joshua will answer all your questions. He doesn't like being kept waiting, though - go talk to him as soon as you can.
translation: 约书亚会回答你所有的问题。但他不喜欢花太多时间等待别人，我们快点走吧。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: I'm called Follows-Chalk. Joshua sent me to scout for any outsiders coming up from the Southern Passage.
translation: 我叫追踪印记。约书亚派我来监视每一个从南部通道进入锡安的外来者。

original: We can talk more about that later, though - it's not smart to keep Joshua waiting.
translation: 我们可以晚会儿再详谈，让约书亚等着是不明智的。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: This is the eastern fork of the Virgin River, and it's the place we Dead Horses call home. Joshua says it is a temple to God's glory on earth.
translation: 这是维琴河的东支流，是我们死马部落称为家的地方。约书亚说这是上帝在地上荣耀的圣殿。

original: We can talk more about it later, though - it's not smart to keep Joshua waiting.
translation: 我们可以晚会儿再详谈，让约书亚等着是不明智的。

original: Glad you made it. Joshua's just to the south, inside the Angel Cave. You'll want to talk to him straight away.
translation: 很高兴你做到了。约书亚在南面的天使洞穴里。你可以直接过去跟他交谈。

original: All right, people. Been a long couple weeks, but here we are. Zion.
translation: 好的，伙计们，经过了漫长的几周，我们终于到了。这就是，锡安！

original: I know your feet hurt, I know you're tired. But I need everyone's mind on the trail ahead.
