translation: 我知道你已经腰酸腿疼，我知道你已经身心俱疲，但我要你们把头抬起来继续前进。

original: Ain't the trail ahead worries me, Jed. Those descents we made, through that slot canyon back up there.
translation: 前方的道路令我有点担心，杰德。那些悬崖和溪谷看起来很危险。

original: Ain't no way we're getting back out the way we come. And then what?
translation: 我们不可能回到来的路上。然后怎么样？

original: Goddammit, Stella, heard you the first time, and the fifteenth, too
translation: 上帝啊，史黛拉，我已经听你牢骚了不知道多少次了。

original: The New Canaanites will know a way. And if they don't, we got the maps on our friend's Pip-Boy over there.
translation: 新迦南人一定知道路的。即使不知道，我们这儿有位朋友还有哔哔小子呢。

original: Enough lollygagging! Get moving and keep an eye out for tribals!
translation: 好了，不许再废话了！行动起来，对那些神出鬼没的部落民时刻保持警惕！

original: Like I care. Let's just go. I'm ready.
translation: 我们走吧，我已经准备好了。

original: No objections.
translation: 不反对。

original: God's will.
translation: 上帝的旨意。

original: Let him keep his dignity. Give him a fighting chance.
translation: 让他保留尊严吧。给他一个战斗的机会。

original: He never had any dignity to begin with. None of them did.
translation: 他本来就没有什么尊严，他们都没有。

original: But for your sake... for the Sorrows' sake, I'll let him die on his feet.
translation: 但看在你的份上...看在悲恸部落的份上，我会让他站着死。

original: Stand up and look at what's come for you!
translation: 站起来，看看你的下场！

original: Joshua, you've already won. Look around you. There's no need to kill him.
translation: 约书亚，你已经赢了。看看你周围，你已经没有必要杀他了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] He has a debt to pay for what he's done and I've come to collect. And so he's chosen to cower in the water like a dumb animal.
translation: [成功] 他要为他之前所做的一切付出代价。他只配像只狗一样蜷缩在水里。

original: Don't listen to this... thing! His cries are those of a mad beast caught in a thicket! He gave no mercy to my family, and I will give none to his.
translation: 别听...这个家伙的话！野兽，只有当困在囚笼里才会嘶吼！他对我的家人丧尽天良，今天，我要以牙还牙！

original: We warned you at Syracuse, and you persisted.
translation: 我们在锡拉丘兹警告过你，但你依旧偏执。

original: You took advantage of us at New Canaan to drive us out, and like the dogs of Caesar you are, you followed us to Zion.
translation: 你把我们从新迦南赶了出来，又像凯撒的狗一样追踪我们到锡安。

original: And now you stand on holy ground, a temple to God's glory on Earth. But the only use for an animal in our temple is sacrifice!
translation: 你现在站的地方，就是上帝在地上的圣殿，但在我们的圣殿里，畜生的唯一用途就是献祭！

original: Kale watcha nei conserva oh! You understand me, don't you? Don't you?!
translation: “上帝作证，你们将无人幸免！”你明白我的意思吧，不是吗？！

original: Whatever. Joshua, put a cap in General Gobbledigook here.
translation: 无所谓了，约书亚，给这个天书将军戴上帽子。

original: Baika-ker! You devil!
translation: 杀人犯！你这魔鬼！

original: You're right. We're going to kill you, but not like this. Defend yourself!
translation: 你说得对，我们会杀掉你的，但不是以这种方式。起来，自卫！

original: Yoocan no nikumpa me! Deyai-yoo!
translation: 你打不过我的！死吧！你！

original: Whoa. This isn't what I signed up for. Let me talk to Joshua about this.
translation: 哇哦，这可不是我期望的，让我和约书亚先谈谈。

original: Him hear you. You talk!
translation: 他听见你了，你说！

original: Let's do it.
translation: 我们动手吧。

original: God be with you.
translation: 愿上帝与你同在。

original: Thank you for this. I know Daniel doesn't approve, but destroying the White Legs is the only way to ensure the Sorrows can remain in Zion.
translation: 感谢你这么做。我知道丹尼尔不会同意，但彻底摧毁白腿部落是悲恸部落留在锡安的唯一方法。

original: You and I will lead a group of Dead Horse warriors and Sorrows hunters into Three Marys from this position.
translation: 你和我率领一队死马部落战士和悲恸部落猎手从这里进入三玛丽岩。

original: Our objective is to find the White Legs' leader, Salt-Upon-Wounds, and prevent him from fleeing.
translation: 我们的目标就是找到白腿部落酋长，伤口撒盐，并且阻止他伺机逃跑。

original: Show no quarter to the White Legs we come across. Make no mistake about why we are here. This is an extermination.
translation: 对你路上遇到的白腿部落的人不要有任何怜悯之心，别搞错我们来这里的目的，这是一场种族灭绝。

original: I prefer to travel alone, thanks.
translation: 我还是更喜欢一个人行动，谢谢。

original: The lone Bighorner is the most vulnerable to its enemies. In the herd lies strength - if you reconsider your choice, I will be here. Paz patasooba.
translation: 落单的大角羊在敌人面前最脆弱，力量在于群体。如果你重新考虑你的选择，我就在这里。安静的走吧。

original: Sounds good. Let's go.
translation: 听起来不错，我们走。

original: Before we depart, our shaman, White Bird, asked me to convey his desire to speak with you.
translation: 在我们动身之前，我们的萨满，白鸟，让我转达他想和你谈谈的愿望。

original: Certainly. We should make haste, then.
translation: 当然，我们快动身吧。

original: Hold up, see that log over there? Take a closer look. There might be some good stuff tucked in there.
translation: 等等，你看到那边的圆木了吗？你走近点看，那里面说不定藏着好东西。

original: What would you suggest I do instead?
translation: 那你有什么建议？

original: Hmm... you might try luring the baby out with some banana yucca. These Bighorners go crazy for the stuff.
translation: 嗯...你可以试着用香蕉丝兰作为诱饵，吸引那个小家伙。这些羊对那玩意儿非常着迷。

original: What do you know about the White Legs?
translation: 你有没有听说过“白腿部落”？

original: Used to be they raided northeast of Caliente, time to time. But then the Desert Rangers fell apart ten years ago, absorbed into the NCR.
translation: 他们以前会时不时地从东北部袭击卡连特。但10年前，沙漠游骑兵被NCR兼并了。

original: Soon enough the White Legs were swarming all over that stretch of I-15. Folks learned not to head north if they wanted to keep their scalps.
translation: 没多久，白腿部落席卷15号公路。人们都说，如果想保住头皮的话，千万不要往北走。

original: Eventually the White Legs destroyed the bridges across the Virgin River, over in Arizona. End of discussion.
translation: 后来，白腿部落摧毁了架在维琴河上的桥，亚利桑那州被彻底隔离。好了，讨论到此结束。

original: Were the 80s a gang, or a tribe?
translation: 这个“80号公路”是一个帮派，还是一个部落？

original: What's the difference? Raiders is raiders.
translation: 有什么区别？掠夺者就是掠夺者。

original: Bunch of them swept in to town and dragged off two working girls. Deputies and me gave pursuit, straight into 80s territory.
translation: 有一次，他们有一伙人闯进小镇，拖走了两个妓女。我带着我的副手们一直追赶到他们的领地。

original: By the time we caught up with the girls, there wasn't much left of them. So we turned for home.
translation: 当我们终于追上那几个女孩时，他们已经跑得无影无踪了。于是我们踏上返途之旅。

original: Made it back to Caliente without further losses, but we was watched the whole way. Never seen so few people cover so much land. Goddamn creepy.
translation: 我们安全无恙地返回卡连特，但一路上一直受到监视。我从没见过就这么几个人能占据这么大片土地，真令人毛骨悚然。

original: If the 80s had wanted to kill us, we would've been dead. Guess they figured we weren't worth the trouble.
translation: 如果他们想杀死我们，那我们早就死了。我猜，我们对他们来说就像大象眼中的蚂蚁一样，连踩一踩的价值都没有。

original: Tell me about Caliente.
translation: 跟我谈谈卡连特这个地方。

original: Place lived up to its name, that's for sure.
translation: 这地方名副其实，这是肯定的。（译者注：卡连特英文有“火热”的意思）

original: When you got fresh water and a trickle of geothermic power, always be some gang of assholes wants to kill you for it.
translation: 只要你有淡水和一点地热能，总有一帮混蛋想杀了你。

original: Spent more years and took more bullets than I care to admit protecting that hellhole from dangers, within and without.
translation: 我在那儿呆了好几年，为了保护自己，吃了很多长眼和不长眼的子弹。

original: If it wasn't the 80s or the White Legs raiding, it was someone from town drunk off his ass trying to win an argument with a shotgun.
translation: 要不是那些“80号”和“白腿”的入侵，我还在和那些醉鬼玩一枪决胜的游戏。

original: Got tired of shooting the folks I was supposed to protect. So... now I do this.
translation: 我已经厌倦了射杀那些我本该保护的人。所以...现在我干这行。

original: What was that like to grow up in New Reno?
translation: 你在新里诺时的生活怎么样？

original: Imagine New Vegas if there was no Mr. House-type fella keeping the peace, then give everybody a gun and a Jet addiction.
translation: 你就想象，如果新维加斯没有一个豪斯似的铁腕维持和平那会怎样？呵呵，很简单，每个人都是瘾君子，每个人手里都一把枪。

original: Town's run by a bunch of crime families, no law to speak of. Make trouble, and you wind up buried in Golgotha, outside town.
translation: 镇子被一群犯罪家族统治着，根本没有法律可言。一旦惹了事，你就会被埋进城外的髑髅地。

original: The scuzz factor's off the charts. Non-stop whoring and drugs. Couldn't walk down the street without getting asked to star in a porn movie.
translation: 人渣的数量已经爆表了。不间断的卖淫和吸毒，走在大街上就会被邀请出演色情电影。

original: So I got my ass out of there while I still owned it. Guess I figured the answer to every problem was rule of law. Naive, huh?
translation: 所以，我趁自己还没被糟蹋前，赶快逃离了那个地方。我以前一直以为，解决所有问题的终极答案就是法治。很天真，是吧？

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这儿干什么？

original: Earning my keep. Jed hired me on as a caravan guard for this expedition of his.
translation: 赚我的生活费。杰德雇我做他的商队护卫。

original: The work suits me. I've tried staying put in one place, but it never works out.
translation: 这份工作很适合我。我曾试着呆在一个地方，但每次都持续不了多长时间。

original: Grew up in New Reno, and I couldn't put that snakepit behind me fast enough.
translation: 我在新里诺长大，我一直想尽快摆脱那个蛇窝。

original: Then I wound up wasting the prime of my life playing Sheriff in Caliente, little town north on the 93. Talk about a pain in the ass.
translation: 之后我把黄金年华都浪费在卡连特，在那里当一名警长。卡连特是靠近93号公路的一个小镇，那里连个屁都没有。

original: You ask me, best to keep moving. At least the scenery changes.
translation: 要我说，最好的生活方式还是四处走动。至少风景会变。

original: Fine. What do you need?
translation: 好的，你需要什么？

original: Sorry, but I'm not going on a scavenger hunt for you.
translation: 抱歉，但我不会为你去玩寻宝游戏。

original: The choice is yours, of course, but you're not going to find a way back to the Mojave without our help.
translation: 当然，选择权在你，但没有我们的帮助，你是回不去莫哈维的。

original: I'll see what I can do.
translation: 我想想我能做什么。

original: Thank you. Follows-Chalk can help you find your way around the valley.
translation: 谢谢你。追踪印记可以帮助你避免在这山谷中迷路。

original: He's inexperienced, but he knows enough of our language to ignore the taboos about Pre-War buildings.
translation: 他没有经验，但他对我们的语言有足够的了解，可以忽略战前建筑的禁忌。

original: Thank you. Now obviously, taboos against Pre-War buildings won't be a matter for you - but take caution when you go rooting around in them.
translation: 谢谢你！很显然，战前建筑的禁忌对你来说不是什么问题，但你在里面翻找的时候还是要小心。

original: Taboo?
translation: 禁忌？

original: The Sorrows believe in a spirit that lives in the caves, say the spirit punished them once for trespassing.
translation: 悲恸部落相信在山洞里住着一位灵魂，他们说他们曾经因为贸然侵入而受到灵魂的惩戒。

original: They put special marks around the cave entrances to keep people out. It doesn't work on the White Legs, of course, but the Dead Horses are spooked.
translation: 他们在那些洞穴入口处抹上白色标记，以防同族人进入。尽管这对白腿部落不管用，但死马部落的人却能在远处就被吓住。

original: Why don't you or Daniel do it?
translation: 为什么你和丹尼尔不去呢？

original: We are responsible for leading and protecting the Sorrows and Dead Horses. They are smart people, but not as worldly as you or I.
translation: 我们有责任带领和保护悲恸部落和死马部落。他们都是聪明人，但不像你我那么世故。

original: I am preparing the Dead Horses for war and Daniel is preparing the Sorrows for... other things.
translation: 我正在为死马部落做战争的准备，而丹尼尔...他有别的打算。

original: How about I go find dear Daniel and shake the information out of him?
translation: 不如我去找亲爱的丹尼尔，从他嘴里把消息套出来？

original: There are many reasons why that would be a bad idea. I will illuminate three.
translation: 这不是一个好主意，原因有很多。我帮你点明三点。

original: First, do not believe that because Daniel is a missionary he is incapable of or unwilling to defend himself.
translation: 首先，不要因为丹尼尔是个传教士就认为他没有能力保护自己。

original: Second, if you harm Daniel or any of the Sorrows or Dead Horses, I will find you. Make no mistake. God willing, you will not leave this valley.
translation: 其次，如果你敢伤害丹尼尔或任何悲恸或死马的部落民，我会找到你，毫无疑问。一切顺利的话，你别想离开这个山谷。

original: Lastly, waging war against good people is bad for the soul. This may not seem important to you now, but it's the most important thing I've said.
translation: 最后，对善良的人们发动袭击会玷污你的灵魂。这对你来说可能不重要，但这是我说过的最重要的话。

original: Don't try to get me to help you. I'm not interested.
translation: 别以为我会帮你，我一点儿也不感兴趣。

original: There are only so many ways you could have entered Zion from the south. You descended by routes that you cannot safely ascend to return to the Mojave.
translation: 从南部进入锡安的路就那么多，你走了一条无法安全返回莫哈维的。

original: I'm not telling you this as a trick. Whether you want to help us or not, you can't get back without Daniel's assistance.
translation: 我这不是在跟你开玩笑。不管你愿不愿意帮我们，没有丹尼尔的帮助你是回不去的。

original: I'm sure he'll be willing to assist you, but we have other responsibilities at the moment.
translation: 我肯定他会愿意帮助你的，但我们现在还有很多其他重要的事情要做。

original: I'm not going to leave without offering to help. What can I do?
translation: 我不会不帮忙就走的，我能做什么？

original: You're a good neighbor to us. We all go through periods of darkness. In such times, we can turn to the Lord, but it's good to have friends.
translation: 你是个好人，谢谢你。我们会经历黑暗的时期，在这种时候，我们通常都会向主祈祷，但有朋友也是好事。

original: Daniel and I need Pre-War tools to help us navigate beyond Zion. Should we need to evacuate, these instruments will be vital to us.
translation: 丹尼尔和我需要一些战前工具来帮我们在锡安导航。一旦我们需要撤离，这些工具将会非常重要。

original: Normally, we would have some of the Dead Horses or Sorrows look for them, but many Pre-War buildings in the valley are taboo. They won't go inside.
translation: 正常情况下，我们会派一些死马部落或悲恸部落的人去收集，但这山谷里大部分的战前建筑对他们来说都是禁区，他们绝对不会进去的。

original: Nice guns.
translation: 枪不错嘛。

original: In the Great Basin and Colorado Plateau, all tribes are known for a specific weapon.
translation: 在大盆地和科罗拉多高原，所有的部落都以一种特定的武器而闻名。

original: White Legs are known for their big submachine guns, "storm drums." They broke into an armory near Spanish Fork and have been using them for years.
translation: 白腿部落以擅长的大型冲锋枪“风暴之鼓”而闻名。他们闯入了西班牙福克附近的一个军械库并使用了好多年。

original: Of course, the Dead Horses have their wooden war clubs and even the Sorrows have their Yao Guai gauntlets.
translation: 当然，死马部落拥有自己最拿手的木制战棍，悲恸部落拥有攻击力惊人的妖怪拳套。

original: This type of .45 Automatic pistol was designed by one of my tribe almost four hundred years ago. Learning its use is a New Canaanite rite of passage.
translation: 这种.45自动式手枪，由我的部落祖先在约400年前设计发明。学习熟练掌握它，是我们新迦南人成人典礼的一部分。

original: Pray? God? What are you talking about?
translation: 祈祷？上帝？你到底在说什么？

original: I am a New Canaanite. We believe we are the heirs of a spiritual tradition given to our ancestors thousands of years ago.
translation: 我是一名新迦南人。我们相信，我们继承了在数千年前我们的祖先已就积淀的精神价值传统。

original: We have made and kept covenants with our Lord, God, to honor his laws. In exchange, we are promised eternal salvation after this life.
translation: 我们与我们的主、上帝签订了盟约，我们尊重他的一切法律。作为交换，我们将得到今生之后永恒的救赎。

original: A day will come when our Lord returns to judge us all. Until then, we must honor his laws and start others along the path of salvation if we can.
translation: 总有一天，我们的主会回来审判我们所有人。直到那一天来到之前，我们都必须遵守他的律法，如果可以的话，带领其他人走上救赎之路。

original: That's why we trade with others and work the tribes. We have more than food and medicine to offer. Good news is our most valuable commodity.
translation: 这就是为什么我们和其他部落贸易与合作的原因。我们不仅仅能提供食物和医药。福音是我们最有价值的商品。

original: How do I get out of here?
translation: 我怎么才能离开这个地方？

original: Even though you made your way in, there's no easy way back. Without a map, you'll die in the wilderness.
translation: 尽管你历尽千辛来到了这个地方，但回头路并不轻松。如果没有地图的帮助，你很快会曝尸荒野。

original: Daniel, one of our missionaries, can help you, but you've caught us at an... inconvenient time. We're under continual threat from the White Legs.
translation: 丹尼尔，我们的传教士之一，他能够帮助你。但你来得...很不是时候。我们现在正在遭受白腿部落的威胁。

original: I came here with the Happy Trails Caravan Company to make contact with the New Canaanites.
translation: 我跟随欢乐小径商队来到这个地方，我们本来是希望能和新迦南人取得联系。

original: Happy Trails. I remember. They were good friends.
translation: 欢乐小径。我记得。他们是我们的好朋友。

original: I have bad news for your employers. New Canaan was destroyed, its citizens scattered. All because of the White Legs. And Caesar, of course.
translation: 但我有个坏消息要告诉你的雇主。新迦南已经被摧毁了，居民四散而逃。这一切都是白腿部落造成的，当然，还有凯撒。

original: The White Legs want to join the Legion. Caesar's rite of passage is the destruction of the New Canaanites, almost assuredly because of me.
translation: 白腿部落想要加入军团。凯撒称，消灭新迦南人将是他们的通过仪式。可以肯定是因为我。

original: The good news is that we can help you find your way back. Daniel, one of the other New Canaanites, has made many maps of the region.
translation: 好消息是，我们可以帮助你找到回家的路。另一个新迦南人，丹尼尔，他为这个地区绘制了很多详细的地图。

original: The bad news is that we can't help you right now. Not with everything that's going on.
translation: 坏消息是，我们现在没法帮助你。我们现在还有很多棘手的事情。

original: PER check.
translation: 感知检查。

original: Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.
translation: 呵呵，好，行，被你说中了。

original: You're lying. You've never been to Vault 22.
translation: 你撒谎。你从来没去过22号避难所。

original: Yeah, so don't bring it up again!
translation: 哦，那就别来再找事！

original: Sorry - didn't mean to be pushy.
translation: 抱歉，我不是有意顶撞你。

original: PER check.
translation: 感知检查。

original: Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.
translation: 呵呵，好，行，被你说中了。

original: You're lying. You have no idea where Vault 22 is.
translation: 你撒谎。你根本就不知道22号避难所在哪里。

original: Yeah, so don't bring it up again!
translation: 哦，那就别来再找事！

original: Sorry - didn't mean to be pushy.
translation: 抱歉，我不是有意顶撞你。

original: Carry some of my gear, and I'll keep my mouth shut.
translation: 带上我的装备，我会闭嘴的。

original: I travel light on purpose, okay? But fine, I'll tell Jed I'm carrying less so you can carry more. What an asshole.
translation: 我轻装上阵是有目的的，好吗？算了，我去和杰德说我少带点，算你碰上个好人。你个混账东西。

original: What I want is for you to scram. This expedition doesn't need you.
translation: 我想要你赶快滚蛋，这趟旅行不需要你。

original: I'm convincing, you're not. He'll believe me.
translation: 我比你有说服力，他会相信我的。

original: Hey hey hey, why you got to go and be like that! Fuck!
translation: 嘿嘿嘿，你为什么要这么说？操！

original: Science
translation: 科学

original: [SUCCEEDED] Bullshit! Ain't nothing wrong with my Pit-Boy! I mean Pip-Boy!
translation: [成功] 胡说！我的比比小子根本没坏！哦，我是说哔哔小子！

original: Your Pip-Boy isn't working. The screen's locked up, and the reboot button is missing.
translation: 你的哔哔小子根本就没在运行。屏幕都已被锁定，就连重启按钮也无影无踪。

original: [FAILED] Fat chance! Like I got time to bring you up to speed. Fuck that.
translation: [失败] 开什么玩笑！我可不会在你身上浪费我宝贵的时间！快滚开。

original: Any chance you could show me some new ways to use my Pip-Boy?
translation: 你能帮我解释解释如何使用哔哔小子么？

original: Look, this is a sweet gig for me! Don't go fucking it up! What are you after, anyways?
translation: 看，这玩意儿有有趣！喂，别弄坏了！说你呢。

original: Speech
translation: 口才

original: [SUCCEEDED] Go ahead! Your word against mine, fucko! See what happens!
translation: [成功] 去吧！你已经冒犯我了！等着瞧！

original: I don't think your Pip-Boy works. I'd better go tell Jed.
translation: 我认为你的哔哔小子已经坏了。我最好去告诉杰德。

original: [FAILED] Yeah, too bad one of them is worn by a total fucking idiot!
translation: [失败] 那是，只可惜其中一个被一个2B带着！

original: I guess two Pip-Boys is better than one, anyway.
translation: 我猜，不管怎样，有两个哔哔小子总比只有一个好。

original: Did you notice I'm wearing a Pip-Boy, too?
translation: 你有没有注意，我也有一个哔哔小子？

original: Huh? ...Of course I noticed! First thing I noticed about you!
translation: 哈？...我当然注意到了！我第一个注意到的人就是你！

original: Me, I'm so used to wearing mine, it's just normal. Don't think you're someone special just because you got one.
translation: 我，我只习惯带我自己的，它很平常。不过不要以为自己也有一个就有多了不起。

original: You're lying. I've been to Vault 22. No one's lived there in 150 years.
translation: 你在撒谎。我去过22号避难所，那里已经有150年没人住过了。

original: You been to Vault two-two, huh?
translation: 你去过...二...二号避难所，啊？

original: I've heard of some strange goings-on at Vault 22. Know any details?
translation: 我听说22号避难所里发生了些奇怪的事，你知道细节吗？

original: I know everything! I know all about it! But I ain't about to tell the likes of you!
translation: 我什么都知道！我全知道！但我不会告诉你这种人的！

original: I have a sworn vow of secrecy, or something like that, to the people I left behind!
translation: 我已经发过誓要保密，绝对不向任何人提起。

original: Where is Vault 22 located?
translation: 22号避难所在哪？

original: I can't tell you that! I have a sworn vow of secrecy, or something like that, to all the people I left behind.
translation: 我凭什么告诉你？！我发过誓要保密，绝对不向任何人提起。

original: What do you use your Pip-Boy for?
translation: 你会用哔哔小子么？

original: Sorry, the shit I do with it is so far over your head, be wasting my time to put it in words you could understand!
translation: 对不起，我能用它做的事已经超出了你的理解范围，你是在浪费我的时间来用你能理解的语言来表达!

original: Basically, it makes me badass. More badass, I mean. It's totally mind-blowing shit. It ain't just some bracelet, know what I mean?
translation: 基本上，它让我变得很厉害，我的意思是更厉害了。这太令人兴奋了，它不仅仅是一个手镯，明白我的意思吗？

original: Jed says it's got maps and shit like that, so that's how I'm gonna guide this caravan where it needs to go! Not that I didn't know all that already!
translation: 杰德说它上面可以显示地图，所以我就要靠这个东西为整支商队导航。不是说我之前不知道这些！

original: Where'd you get the Vault suit?
translation: 你从哪弄到的这套避难所连身衣？

original: Where the fuck you think? Vault two-two! That's where I grew up!
translation: 你他妈以为呢？二二号避难所！我是在那儿长大的！

original: Never mind, I don't want to spend caps on that right now.
translation: 别在意，我现在不想就此花任何一分钱。

original: No sweat off my tits, asshole. Guess you better start deciding what gear you're going to leave behind.
translation: 送上门的机会都不要，蠢货。我猜你可以开始好好考虑该把什么东西扔掉了。

original: I'll give you 50 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
translation: 如果你能说服杰德同意让我能再背点东西，我就给你50个瓶盖。

original: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.
translation: 一言为定。你运气真好，他对我很信任。

original: I'll give you 75 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
translation: 如果你能说服杰德同意让我能再背点东西，我就给你75个瓶盖。

original: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.
translation: 一言为定。你运气真好，他对我很信任。

original: I'll give you 100 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
translation: 如果你能说服杰德同意让我能再背点东西，我就给你100个瓶盖。

original: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.
translation: 一言为定。你运气真好，他对我很信任。

original: Never mind. It's your problem, not mine.
translation: 没关系。反正是你的问题，不是我的。

original: Why'd you bring it up, then? When the withdrawal hits and I feel like killing something, I'll know where to start!
translation: 你干嘛要挑明？如果毒瘾来了，我想杀人的时候，我知道从谁开始了！

original: 80 caps.
translation: 80个瓶盖。

original: That much for a dose? Fucking robbery!
translation: 要这么多？抢劫啊你！

original: All right, here's your money! Don't spend it all one place!
translation: 算了，给你钱！省着点花！

original: Ten hits for 300 caps.
translation: 10针300个瓶盖。

original: Ten hits'll last me a good while. Worth every cap. Now fuck off.
translation: 10针，哈，能维持很长时间了。值！现在滚开。

original: Five hits for 150 caps.
translation: 5针150个瓶盖。

original: That'll last me a while! Nice. Now take your caps and fuck off.
translation: 太好了！给，拿上我的瓶盖，然后滚开。

original: Three hits for 90 caps.
translation: 3针90个瓶盖。

original: Three hits? Like that's gonna hold me? Fine, I'll take them.
translation: 3针？听起来不错啊。好，我要了。

original: Two hits for 60 caps.
translation: 2针60个瓶盖。

original: Two hits? Ain't gonna last long. Fine, hand it over.
translation: 2针？根本持续不了多久。好吧，快拿出来。

original: One hit for 30 caps.
translation: 1针30个瓶盖。

original: One lousy hit? That'll cover me for an hour! Hand it over.
translation: 一大针？哈，可以轻松一小时了！快拿出来。

original: Yeah, leave now. Before the withdrawal hits you out on the trail, no Psycho for miles.
translation: 现在就滚蛋吧你。等到了半路时毒瘾发作，到时几公里范围内都不会有疯狂药。

original: Fine! You win, asshole! Enjoy leading the expedition into a fucking ambush! Hope you all die!
translation: 好！你赢了，我混！好好享受踏入陷阱的快乐吧！希望你们都早点死！

original: I can sell you a dose of Fixer, but it won't be cheap.
translation: 我可以卖你一些瘾头解，但它们可不便宜。

original: Fixer? Never said I wanted to kick the habit!
translation: 瘾头解？我可不想碰那玩意儿！

original: Guess I can use it when I run out of the good stuff. How much?
translation: 但，如果实在走投无路了，也只能靠它了。你卖多少钱？

original: I've got Psycho to sell, but it won't come cheap.
translation: 我这可有一堆疯狂药，但它们可不便宜。

original: All right, all right - I am a little light. How many hits you holding?
translation: 好吧好吧，我确实带得不多。你一共有多少针？

original: How much Psycho you got stashed away? If you run out on the trail... the withdrawal's not pleasant.
translation: 你究竟藏了多少疯狂药？如果你中途用完了...你自己心里清楚毒瘾发作的后果。

original: Goddammit, I didn't say nothing about using Psycho!
translation: 上帝，我可从没说过什么疯狂药！

original: But, uh... Just talking hypno-theoretically here... Got any suggestions?
translation: 但是，呃...理论上，这...你，你有什么建议？

original: for extra gear.
translation: 弄点额外装备。

original: [FAILED] Ricky travels light on purpose, asshole! If you're looking for a slave, ask someone else!
translation: [失败] 我轻装上阵是有目的的，蠢货！如果你在物色奴隶，找别人去！

original: Looks like you're traveling light. What would you say to carrying some of my stuff?
translation: 看起来你准备轻装上阵。那你能不能帮我背点的东西？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I travel light on purpose, okay? But if the price is right, I'll tell Jed I'm carrying less - so you can carry more. What's your offer?
translation: [成功] 我轻装上阵是有目的的，ok？...但，如果价钱合理的话，我可以和杰德说说，帮你多拿点东西。要不你开个价吧。

original: Looks like you're traveling light. Carry some items for me, and I'll make it worth your while.
translation: 看起来你准备轻装上阵。如果你愿意帮我驮点东西，我会补偿你的。

original: Medicine check.
translation: 医疗检查。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hey hey hey! Fuck you! I didn't say nothing about using Psycho!
translation: [成功] 我靠！操你丫的！我可从没提到过什么疯狂药！

original: Unwarranted hostility and general agitation. How long have you been a Psycho addict?
translation: 无来由的暴躁和综合性的兴奋。你疯狂药上瘾已经多久了？

original: [FAILED] Yeah, Doc, I'm feeling great, fuck you very much. Asshole.
translation: [失败] 是的，医生，我感觉很好。操你丫的，蠢货。

original: Are you feeling all right?
translation: 你一切正常？

original: I see you're wearing a Pip-boy and Vault suit.
translation: 我看到你戴着一个哔哔小子，穿着一身避难所服。

original: Nice job, Eagle Eye! Of course I got a Pit-Boy and a Vault suit! So what?
translation: 好眼光！我当然有哔哔小子和避难所外套了！那又怎样？

original: Ewww. I think I'll pass.
translation: 呃...我想还是算了。

original: I don't think so, honey! You won't be able to resist!
translation: 我可不这么认为，亲爱的！你到时绝对不会有抵抗力的！

original: Guns
translation: 枪械

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hey! That's - man, what a bitch! I was just being friendly!
translation: [成功] 嘿！你个婊子！我只是想表示一下友好！

original: Great, I'll see what I'm shooting at.
translation: 好极了，我想看看我的枪法有多准。

original: Black Widow
translation: 黑寡妇

original: Hey! That's - man, what a bitch! I was just being friendly!
translation: 嘿！你个婊子！我只是想表示一下友好！

original: I'll bring my tweezers and a microscope.
translation: 我会同时带上我的镊子和显微镜。

original: Do you have any other special skills or abilities?
translation: 你还有什么其他的能力或特技？

original: Well, I grew up near Dayglow out west, so yeah, I grew a third nut that glows in the dark!
translation: 啊，我在西部的日辉城长大，所以对，我长了第三个可以在黑暗中发光的“蛋蛋”！

original: I'll drop trou for you out on the trail after dark, sis. Let you see what you're working with, know what I mean?
translation: 等天黑了我会在小路上脱裤子给你看的，姐姐。让你看看你在做什么，懂我的意思吗？

original: What a load of crap. The eyeslits of T-series power armor are bullet-proof!
translation: 满口胡言。T系列的动力甲是防弹的！

original: Then I guess this dumb fucker's armor musta been... D-series or something!
translation: 那，我猜那个白痴的装甲...大概是D系列的，或者别的什么系列！

original: All I know is, he died up real dead when I killed him, okay?
translation: 我只知道，他死了，我杀的，ok？

original: Guns Check
translation: 枪械检查

original: [SUCCEEDED] There so is! Or it was a 9mm or a 10, I don't know! Don't care!
translation: [成功] 啊，对了！是9mm，或者是10mm！总之我才不在乎呢！

original: Said I was good at killing shit up! Never said I was good with numbers!
translation: 说我擅长杀人！从没说过我擅长数学！

original: Too bad there's no such thing as an 11mm submachinegun.
translation: 很遗憾，没有所谓的11毫米冲锋枪这种东西。

original: [FAILED] Whatever. When you're me - a Deadeye - shots like that ain't nothing special. It's just what I do.
translation: [失败] 无论如何，这一枪算是打出去了。没什么特别的，仅此而已。

original: What a shot!
translation: 我操，怎么打成这样？

original: Please go on. This promises to be entertaining.
translation: 请继续，我怎么觉得越来越好玩了。

original: I was walking along, minding my own, and up pops one of them Brotherhoods. He yells "Hand over that laser rifle, asshole!"
translation: 我当时一个人走在路上，正思考着一些问题，这时迎面走过来一个兄弟会的家伙，朝我吼：“把你的激光步枪交出来，蠢货！”

original: So I hand it over, just to make him think I'm scared! But really I'm not! I never am!
translation: 于是我交出来了，因为我想让他误以为我害怕！但事实上我没有！我也从不会！

original: Before he knows what hit him, I draw my 11mm machinegun and BAM! BAM! Right through the eyeslit in his helmet! D.O.A.!
translation: 在他还没明白过来怎么回事前，我抄起11mm冲锋枪朝他飞快地倾泻子弹！哈，只见他的眼珠飞溅，脑袋开花！

original: You're saying that you killed a Brotherhood of Steel Paladin?
translation: 你是说，你杀了一个钢铁兄弟会的圣骑士？

original: What's it sound like I'm saying? If I was saying what you said I was saying, then yeah, I said it!
translation: 你觉得我在说什么？如果我说的和你说的一样，那是，我说了！

original: [SUCCEEDED] No, no, you heard me right. "Deathjaws!" They're like Deathclaws - but bigger teeth!
translation: [成功] 不，不，你没听错。“死亡咬！”，它们只是长得像死亡爪而已，而且牙齿要更大！

original: "Deathjaws," huh? Did you mean to say "Deathclaws?"
translation: “死亡咬”，嗯？你是不是想说“死亡爪”？

original: [FAILED] Just how green are you? Everybody heard of Deathjaws. You better hope I'm around if you run into one.
translation: [失败] 你也太小白了吧？死亡咬之名无人不晓。你最好天天祈祷着，万一你碰到它的时候我就在你身旁。

original: "Deathjaws?" I've never heard of those...
translation: “死亡咬”？我从没听说过这种生物...

original: That's quite a story.
translation: 是个不错的故事。

original: Hell yeah it's quite a story! But I'm quite a man, so stories like that follow me everywhere!
translation: 那是当然！我是个真正的男人，在我身后像这样的小故事数不胜数！

original: Or there was the time one of them Steel Brotherhood assholes made the mistake of messing with me! Last mistake he ever made!
translation: 哦，有一次一个钢铁兄弟会的家伙惹恼了我！哼，结果那成了他平生中犯的最后一次错误！

original: "Deadeye," huh? How did you get that nickname?
translation: “神枪手”，哈？你这个绰号怎么来的？

original: Uh, how you think? I shoot things in the eye, that's how good I am! Yeah, I'm that good!
translation: 啊，那你以为怎么来的？跟你说，只要进入我视线范围内的，没有一个不会倒下的！操，我真他妈牛逼！

original: Why, uh, once I got jumped by three... Deathjaws! Except actually it was four of them! Imagine that!
translation: 至于为什么，哦，我有一次碰到...3只死亡咬！哦，不，是4只！你猜怎么着？

original: But I didn't panic, because... because I never panic! What I did was become a storm of death! Shot every one of them monsters "pop" in the eye!
translation: 我他妈才不怕呢，因为...因为我毫无畏惧！因为我是死亡风暴！一枪打爆所有怪物的眼睛！

original: You do anything around here, besides talk too much?
translation: 你在这除了废话连篇还能做什么吗？

original: You want to know what I do, Bud? Anything I fucking want!
translation: 你想知道我还能做什么，伙计？我他妈的想要什么就有什么！

original: You want to know what I do, Toots? Anything I fucking want!
translation: 你想知道我能干什么，哥们？我他妈的想要什么就有什么！

original: You do anything around here, besides make women sick?
translation: 除了让女人生病，你还做过别的事吗？

original: I'm one of a kind! I been places, see? And done things - lots of them!
translation: 我是独一无二的！我去过很多地方，明白吗？并且做了很多事情！

original: And when it's time to kill shit up? Hell yeah, I'm a fucking storm of death!
translation: 知道什么时候是开枪的最佳时机？哈，倒在我枪下的冤魂数也数不过来，因为我是死亡风暴！

original: Something or someone make the mistake of crossing Ricky? I'll fucking deadeye him, her, or it!
translation: 如果有谁或什么东西惹恼了我？哼，我就弄死他，干死她，搞死它！

original: In fact... yeah, in fact, that's my nickname! "Deadeye" Ricky - that's my name!
translation: 事实上...对，事实上，这才是我的绰号！“神枪手”里基！这才是我的名字！

original: Umm... tell me about this vision quest again?
translation: 嗯...关于这个任务能否再帮我讲述一遍？

original: You go to cave. Find Ghost of She. Lay ghost to rest. This your quest. Bring peace where was strife. Go!
translation: 进入洞穴。找到“她的幽灵”。让她安息。这就是任务。为有纷争的地方带来和平，快去！

original: Okay then... I guess... I guess I don't have any questions after all.
translation: 那好吧...我想...我想我也没什么问题了。

original: Crazy old man. I'm not doing anything for you.
translation: 疯老头子。我不会帮你做任何事情。

original: Spirits guide you whether you listen or not. Smarter to listen, hmm?
translation: 灵魂引导你来此，不管你愿意与否。聪明点，听我说。

original: Okay then. I guess I'll just... go then.
translation: 那好吧，我想我就...马上就去。

original: Go! Return maybe yes, return maybe no. But go.
translation: 去！不管是对是错。去。

original: Wait a minute, what if I don't want to do any of that?
translation: 等一下，如果我什么都不想做的话会怎样？

original: <White Bird stares at you wordlessly.>
translation: <白鸟无言地盯着你>

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我们谈谈别的。

original: What would you speak of?
translation: 你想说什么？

original: What's with this obsession you seem to have with "civilization?"
translation: 你说的这个令你迷上“文明”的东西是什么？

original: Let me tell you a story. When I was a boy, a man came through the valley with one of the caravans. Tall man, big mustache, carried a guitar.
translation: 我来给你讲个故事。当我还是个小孩子的时候，有个男人跟随着一队商队来到这个山谷。他个子很高，胡子很浓，背着一把吉他。

original: I asked what he did for his living, and the interpreter told me he was a singer.
translation: 我问他是做什么的，翻译告诉我他是个歌手。

original: "What is that?" I asked. The man explained that he went from place to place and sang for people, who gave him food and shelter and care in return.
translation: “歌手是什么？”我问。那人解释说，就是居无定所，在不同的地方辗转，通过为人们唱歌换取食物、庇护与关心。

original: I couldn't believe that there was a place in this world where a man could do that. I promised myself then that one day I'd explore that world myself.
translation: 我实在不敢相信在这个世界上居然还有人以此为生。我向自己承诺，将来有一天一定要自己亲自去探索这个世界。

original: Ya? What did he say?
translation: 啊，那他怎么说？

original: I talked to Joshua about your thoughts on civilization.
translation: 我和约书亚就你对文明的观点交换了意见。

original: For as long as I remember, the Dead Horses have thought that places of the old world were taboo. Doesn't look so spooky to me.
translation: 从我记事起，死马的人们就认为旧世界的地方是禁忌之地。在我看来并不可怕。

original: The Narrows up ahead, that's the Sorrows' territory. They're peaceful enough, but you don't want to make them mad.
translation: 前面的狭路，就是悲恸部落的领地。他们很友好，希望你不要惹他们生气。

original: Heads up, this is the Three Marys. White Legs territory. You sure you want to head in there?
translation: 抬头看，这就是三玛丽岩，白腿部落的领地。你确定还想继续往前？

original: Where do they come from?
translation: 他们从哪来？

original: That's the weird part - normally the White Legs keep to the Great Salt Lake. I don't know what brought them down this far south.
translation: 这就是最奇怪的地方，正常情况下，白腿部落是聚居在大盐湖那里。我不知道是什么风把他们吹到这么远的南方。

original: Wait, what? New Canaan was wiped out? How?
translation: 等等，什么？新迦南被摧毁了？怎么会？

original: That's what Joshua said. White Legs came down from Great Salt Lake in force - fell on New Canaan before they could mount a defense.
translation: 约书亚就是这么说的。白腿部落从大盐湖下来，在新迦南人还没建立起有效防御前，摧毁了整个新迦南。

original: Joshua found some of the survivors led by a man named Daniel. Most of them have fled the valley, but Daniel stayed on with the Sorrows tribe.
translation: 约书亚找到了几名幸存者，带领他们的是一个叫丹尼尔的人。他们中大部分都已经离开山谷了，但丹尼尔在悲恸部落留了下来。

original: He and Joshua have been arguing over whether to stand and fight the White Legs or take the Sorrows and the Dead Horses out of the valley.
translation: 他和约书亚一直在争论，到底应该带着两个部落一起对付白腿，还是带着他们也一起离开这个山谷。

original: You've got a funny idea about what the Mojave's like, but I'll go with you and see your boss.
translation: 你对莫哈维的描述真有趣，但现在我要跟你一起去见你的老大。

original: Goot sists. Maybe while you're there you can tell me about where you came from, yeah?
translation: 太好了。或许等我们到了营地，你可以再跟我详细聊聊你来的那个地方。

original: Tell me about Waking Cloud's family.
translation: 跟我说说唤醒白云的家人吧。

original: What uh... what do you want to know, exactly? I'm sure she could tell you much better than I.
translation: 什么呃...你到底想知道什么？我相信她会比我更清楚地告诉你。

original: I ain't feeling good, man. I feel like shit! I got the shakes, got the sweats. This fucking sucks!
translation: 我浑身不舒服，伙计。我快撑不住了！我浑身颤抖背上布满汗水。真是糟糕透顶！

original: Oh man, yeah! Trigger finger is feeling itch-ay! Come on, assholes! Show yourselves and Deadeye Ricky'll blow your fucking heads off!
translation: 哦，伙计们！扣动扳机的手指感觉很痒！来吧，你们这帮混蛋！快出来，“神枪手”里基会把你们的脑袋打爆的！哈哈哈！

original: Ah, the Eastern Virgin. What's the phrase? "House sweet house?"
translation: 啊，东维琴河。这什么意思？“甜美的房子”？

original: That's Pine Creek up there. Supposedly it's one of only two ways out of Zion Valley. Of course, without a map, good luck surviving.
translation: 那边就是松溪，据说这是离开锡安山谷仅有的两条路之一。当然，没有地图的话，只能祝你好运了。

original: I like your bear glove. Where can I get one?
translation: 我喜欢你的熊爪拳套，我在哪里能弄到？

original: A Sorrow's Yao Guai Fist is a sacred symbol. It shows that we belong to the tribe and have willingly undertaken a dangerous quest to aid the tribe.
translation: 悲恸部落的每一个妖怪拳套都是神圣的象征。它表示我们属于这个部落，并且愿意承担一项危险的任务来帮助这个部落。

original: Each Sorrow makes his own - and only after hunting and slaying a Yao Guai that threatened our people.
translation: 每一个族人都是自己制作，当然，是在亲手杀掉一个威胁我们的妖怪之后。

original: Our shaman, White Bird, oversees the rites. Perhaps if you spoke to him, he would allow you to undertake such a quest.
translation: 我们的萨满，白鸟，监管着这项仪式。如果你去找他谈，他或许会允许你执行这样一件任务。

original: Maybe later, if there's time.
translation: 或许晚点再说吧。

original: I do hope you will reconsider. I will point out his cave on your map, should you wish to speak to him later.
translation: 我希望你能重新考虑一下。我会在你的地图上指出他所在的洞穴，希望你晚会儿去找他谈一谈。

original: Okay, I'll talk to him.
translation: 好的，我会去找他的。

original: Excellent. His cave overlooks the camp - I will show you where.
translation: 好极了。他的洞穴所在位置可以俯瞰整个营地，我来只给你看。

original: Any idea what he wants?
translation: 你知道他找我想干什么吗？

original: He did not say. White Bird is notoriously close-lipped. But he is wise, and you would do well to speak to him.
translation: 他没有说，白鸟是出了名的沉默寡言。但他很聪明，你最好和他谈谈。

original: Wildlife problem? What kind of wildlife?
translation: 野生动物的问题？哪一种野生动物？

original: All right, let's go.
translation: 好的，走吧。

original: Right.
translation: 好的。

original: I'll see you on the other side.
translation: 我在另一边等你。

original: Go with God, brother.
translation: 愿上帝保佑你，兄弟。

original: Go with God, sister.
translation: 愿上帝保佑你，姐妹。

original: This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
translation: 我们浪费的时间太多了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

original: Maybe later, if there's time.
translation: 或许晚点再说吧。

original: As you wish. I will point out his cave on your map, should you wish to speak to him later.
translation: 如你所愿。我会在你的地图上指出他所在的洞穴，希望你晚会儿去找他谈一谈。

original: Okay, I'll talk to him.
translation: 好的，我会去找他的。

original: Excellent. His cave overlooks the camp - I will show you where.
translation: 好极了。他的洞穴所在位置可以俯瞰整个营地，我来只给你看。

original: Any idea what he wants?
translation: 你知道他找我想干什么吗？

original: He did not say. White Bird is notoriously close-lipped. But he is wise, and you would do well to speak to him.
translation: 他没有说，白鸟是出了名的沉默寡言。但他很聪明，你最好和他谈谈。

original: Wildlife problem? What kind of wildlife?
translation: 野生动物的问题？哪一种野生动物？

original: I'll see you on the other side.
translation: 我在另一边等你。

original: This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
translation: 我们浪费的时间太多了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

original: I could talk to him, maybe he'll open up more to me.
translation: 我可以跟他谈谈，他或许愿意对我讲。

original: Perhaps he will. I sometimes feel he thinks he must protect me. If he has news, I would know of it.
translation: 也许他会的。有时我觉得他认为他必须保护我。如果他有消息，我会知道的。

original: <Lie> Daniel isn't avoiding talking about your family. He's just preoccupied with all of this.
translation: <撒谎> 丹尼尔不是不愿意和你讨论你的家庭，他只是太全神贯注于周遭所有事情。

original: This is true? You spoke to him? Oh, that is a relief. Grasas, na'ne.
translation: 真的吗？你跟他说过了？哦，那我心里的石头就放下了。谢谢你，我的朋友。

original: Follows-Chalk seems like he's interested in seeing more of the world.
translation: 追踪印记似乎对亲眼见识外面的世界很感兴趣。

original: I thought he might. It's been some time since I've visited... civilized places. I don't have fond memories of them.
translation: 我就知道他会。自从我上次访问那些...文明之地，已经过去很久了。我对他们没什么美好的回忆。

original: But I have always seen these places from the outside. I'd rather not influence him more than I already do. Why don't you talk to him?
translation: 但我心里非常清楚这些“文明之地”的本质，我不想对他施加更多的影响了。为什么你不去跟他谈一谈？

original: <Lie> That a man must follow his heart no matter where it leads him.
translation: <撒谎> 是男人，就要相信自己的直觉，坚信自己的信念。

original: Really? He said that? Hoo! I'm going to do it. After all this is over, I'm going to go explore civilization!
translation: 真的？他这么说了？呼！！我明白了。等到这一切结束了，我要去亲身探险外面的文明！

original: Dank ni, ahk iss - I never would have had the growans to ask him myself.
translation: 谢谢你，要不是你，我绝对不会鼓起勇气去问他的。

original: <Lie> That it's a den of corruption and vice, and the Dead Horses' way of living is better.
translation: <撒谎> 外面其实是个腐朽和堕落的“天堂”，相比之下死马部落的生活方式更适合你。

original: Oh. Well, I guess that's about what I could expect from him. I'd like a minute alone to think about this. Dank ni.
translation: 哦，那好吧，我猜他也会这么跟我说。我想一个人单独呆会儿，好好想想。谢谢。

original: Really? Maybe I could talk to him about it for you. Be a neutral party.
translation: 真的？那我帮你跟他讲。反正我是个中立方。

original: You'd do that? Sure, sounds smart to me. He might not get so mad at you.
translation: 你愿意帮我说？哦，谢谢你，他对你似乎不会特别生气。

original: What does Joshua think of this?
translation: 约书亚是怎么想的？

original: I, umm, I haven't told him yet. Never had the growans.
translation: 我，呃，我还没跟他说，还没鼓起勇气。

original: Enough with the drama. I just want to get home.
translation: 我受够了，我只是想回家。

original: I understand. The safest way for you to resolve this is to help me and the Dead Horses defeat the White Legs.
translation: 我明白。对你来说最安全的方式就是帮助我和死马部落击溃白腿部落。

original: Daniel wants to evacuate the Sorrows from the valley. I think this will be much more difficult for everyone, you included.
translation: 丹尼尔想要撤离这个山谷。我想这对任何人来说都是艰难和痛苦的，包括你。

original: You can rationalize, if you'd like. A lucky coincidence of my faith and your pragmatism leading to different goals by the same means.
translation: 如果你愿意，你也可以给自己找个理由。巧合的是，我的信仰和你的实用主义可以通过同一种方式同时实现。

original: But you'll have to help convince Daniel, because I can't do it alone. The good Lord knows I've tried.
translation: 但你首先必须帮我说服丹尼尔，因为我一个人办不到。仁慈的主知道我试过了。

original: Fair enough. What do you want me to do about it?
translation: 说得通，你想让我干什么？

original: Talk to Daniel about fighting the White Legs. He wants to evacuate the valley, believes it is best for the Sorrows, physically and spiritually.
translation: 请和丹尼尔谈谈与白腿部落作战的问题。他想要撤离这个峡谷，他相信这是对悲恸部落最有利的决定。

original: He knows I disagree, but believes my desire to fight is the result of my... history of violence.
translation: 他知道我不同意，但他认为我求战的欲望...只是我过去暴力历史的延续。

original: Perhaps if he heard an argument from you, he could be convinced. In any case, it's important enough to try.
translation: 或许他应该听听你看法，才有可能被说服。不管怎样，这都值得一试。

original: I don't know if you've figured this out yet, but I don't believe what you believe.
translation: 我不知道你到底想说什么，但我完全不相信你所相信的那些东西。

original: Then as a Gentile, you should find this to be even more beneficial. If the Sorrows stay in Zion, you will always have a link to New Canaan.
translation: 那么作为一名异教徒，你应该明白这是对你最有利的途径。如果悲恸部落留在锡安，你才能继续与新迦南建立联系。

original: If the Sorrows leave Zion, so too do the New Canaanites. What's more, you'll have more White Legs coming farther south.
translation: 如果悲恸部落离开锡安，那么新迦南人会紧随其步伐。此外，还会有更多的白腿部落的人从南面而来。

original: You may not be concerned over matters of faith, but this is a case where faith and practicality coincide.
translation: 你可能不关心信仰的问题，但这是一个信仰和实际情况相吻合的情况。

original: No one wants the White Legs here. We just need to convince Daniel that it's our responsibility to ensure that doesn't happen.
translation: 没有人希望白腿部落继续留在这个地方。我们需要能说服丹尼尔，我们有义务和责任确保那些事情永远不会发生。

original: Hmm. Okay.
translation: 恩，好的。

original: You're not so certain. Fair enough. We all have doubts.
translation: 你不太确定，说得过去，我们都有疑惑。

original: Blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed. But you can be a Thomas for now. Fight the White Legs enough and you'll see the truth.
translation: 那没有看见就信的，有福了。但你现在可以暂时当托马斯，跟我一起与白腿战斗，你就会看到真相。

original: I just hope that by the time you understand, there will still be time to convince Daniel that we have to fight for Zion to save it, and the Sorrows.
translation: 我只希望那时你能明白，我们还有时间说服丹尼尔与我们一起作战，来拯救锡安，来拯救悲恸部落。

original: Fair enough, I guess.
translation: 差不多了，我想。

original: I and the Dead Horses are prepared to do what must be done to protect Zion from the White Legs.
translation: 我和死马部落已经做好一切必须的准备来保护锡安。

original: And though Daniel won't accept it yet, there are many Sorrows who are also prepared. They may not be warriors, but this is their home.
translation: 尽管丹尼尔现在不接受，但有很多悲恸部落的人也已经准备好了。他们可能不是专门的战士，但这里是他们的家。

original: If you have a chance to speak with Daniel about this, ask him to consider defending Zion instead of abandoning it.
translation: 如果你有机会和丹尼尔谈谈，请让他仔细考虑一下如何保护锡安，而不是抛弃锡安。

original: He has good intentions, but I fear that if we evacuate the Sorrows from this place, it will be lost to them, and us, forever.
translation: 他的初衷很好，但我担心就这样撤离锡安，我们就会永远失去这里。

original: I do. They're little more than raiders, if that.
translation: 我知道，他们其实就是帮掠夺者。

original: Then you must bear witness of this revelation to Daniel. The obviousness of it escapes him.
translation: 那么你最好把你的观点同样表述给丹尼尔，他没有意识到这是显而易见的。

original: We both desire a non-violent solution to this problem. Where we differ is that only one of us believes it is possible.
translation: 我们都希望通过非暴力手段解决问题。我们的观点不同在于，只有一个人相信此路可行。

original: Speak your heart to Daniel when the opportunity presents itself. There may yet be time to save Zion.
translation: 当机会出现时，对丹尼尔说出你的心。也许还有时间拯救锡安。

original: And what kind of tribe is that?
translation: 那究竟是个什么部落？

original: God told Moses that the tribes of Cain would not be welcome in Zion. The White Legs are as close as I have seen, beyond hope, beyond redemption.
translation: 上帝曾告诉摩西，该隐的子民不受锡安的欢迎。白腿部落就是这样一帮人，没有希望，没有救赎。

original: But if the Sorrows die in a state of ignorance, their salvation may be delayed as well, passing from life in this world to a spiritual prison.
translation: 但是，如果悲恸部落在无知的状态中死去，他们的救赎也可能被推迟，从现世的生活进入精神的监狱。

original: We have a responsibilty to protect this place and those who have come to dwell in it. If you feel the same way, speak with Daniel.
translation: 我们有责任保护这里，保护那些以这里赖以生存的人们。如果你也这么想，请与丹尼尔谈谈。

original: There may yet be time to save Zion from those who are too ignorant to understand what they have come to destroy.
translation: 也许还有时间把锡安从那些无知的人手中拯救出来，他们不知道自己要来毁灭什么。

original: Yes, what has to be done is you have to get these tribes out of here.
translation: 对，现在你需要做的就是将他们赶出这里。

original: The Sorrows need help. We brought the White Legs here, the New Canaanites. This is their home, Zion, God's gift to them.
translation: 悲恸部落需要帮助，这里是他们的家。是我们新迦南人把白腿部落带到这里来的，这是他们的家园，锡安，上帝赐给他们的礼物。

original: In abandoning it, we will gain nothing and will lose more than you realize. Please think about this, and look in your heart.
translation: 放弃它，我们将一无所获，失去的将比你意识到的更多。请考虑一下，看看自己的内心。

original: The light of the mind alone cannot burn away all darkness.
translation: 仅凭心灵之光无法驱散所有的黑暗。

original: I need to think about it.
translation: 我要考虑一下。

original: Of course. Think on it, and look in your heart. The light of the mind alone cannot dispel the whole world's darkness.
translation: 当然，好好考虑一下，听听你内心的想法。仅凭心灵之光无法驱散所有的黑暗。

original: I'll talk to him about it. Maybe he can be persuaded.
translation: 我会和他说的。也许我能说服他。

original: Thank you. It will be for the best.
translation: 谢谢你。这样最好了。

original: You'll get no argument from me. These White Legs are human garbage.
translation: 我和你意见一致，这些白腿部落简直就是人间败类。

original: They're still God's children, but if they turn against their brothers and sisters, won't listen to reason...
translation: 他们仍然是上帝的孩子，但如果他们背叛自己的兄弟姐妹，不听道理...

original: If they pollute the Lord's temples on Earth, like Zion, who are we to stand by and let them continue?
translation: 如果他们玷污了上帝在地上的圣殿，比如锡安，我们又怎能袖手旁观，让他们继续下去呢？

original: Daniel does not yet see things the way we do. He is the John to our Matthew and Mark. When you have a moment, speak with him.
translation: 丹尼尔看问题的角度和我们不一样，他是我们的马太和马可的约翰。你有空的时候，和他谈谈。

original: There may still be time to save Zion from the White Legs, to keep God's children here, in this living temple.
translation: 我们现在还来得及把白腿部落彻底赶出这片山谷，让上帝的孩子们留在这里，在这座活着的圣殿里。

original: Why are you talking to me about it?
translation: 你为什么要跟我谈这些？

original: Daniel and I don't agree on everything, but in our hearts, we both want what's best for the Sorrows and Dead Horses.
translation: 丹尼尔和我在某事情上不能达成一致意见，但在我们的内心深处，我们都希望能为悲恸部落和死马部落做出最正确的决定。

original: You've seen what the White Legs do, and I think you know what has to be done. If Daniel hears it from someone other than me, well...
translation: 你已经看到了白腿部落的所作所为，我想你应该清楚我们需要采取什么措施。如果丹尼尔听到了除我以外的别人也这么说，那么...

original: Zion may not be lost to us after all.
translation: 我们可能终究不会失去锡安。

original: This conversation just got pretty dark. What was that about happy... dashing the little ones?
translation: 这段对话太阴暗了。有没有...开心一点的？

original: Happy are those who do the work of the Lord. Zion belongs to God and the people of God. It is a natural temple and monument to his glory.
translation: 为上帝作工的人有福了，锡安属于上帝和上帝的子民。这是一座自然的圣殿，也是他荣耀的纪念碑。

original: When our Lord entered the temple and found it polluted by money-changers and beasts, did he ask them to leave? Did he cry? Did he simply walk away?
translation: 当我们的主进了圣殿，看见这里被兑换银钱的人和走兽所玷污，他要求他们离开吗？他哭了吗？他就走开了吗？

original: No. He drove them out. It is one thing to forgive a slap across my cheek, but an insult to the Lord requires... no, it demands correction.
translation: 不，他把他们赶了出去。我可以原谅打在我脸上的一巴掌，但侮辱上帝...不，这一切，必须得到立即修正。

original: You don't want to leave Zion. You'd rather kill every last one of the White Legs.
translation: 如果你不想离开锡安的话，你最好杀死所有的白腿部落。

original: Given those two choices, yes. In the best of all possible worlds, they would just leave us in peace. But they won't.
translation: 鉴于这两个选择，是的。在最好的情况下，他们会离开这里，但他们不会。

original: I don't enjoy killing, but when done righteously, it's just a chore, like any other.
translation: 我不喜欢杀戮，但只要正义地行事，它就只是一件苦差事，就像其他事情一样。

original: Practiced hands make for short work. And the good Lord knows there's much to be done here.
translation: 熟手能够迅速解决工作，而仁慈的主知道还有很多事要做。

original: No, and I don't really care.
translation: 不，我完全不关心。

original: Living in willful ignorance is an ugly thing, but God often speaks loudest in the wild places of his creation, like Zion.
translation: 活在故意的无知中是一件丑陋的事情，但上帝经常在他创造的荒野中大声说话，比如锡安。

original: Zion is a place, and a state of being, that has been lost to us several times in the past. Each loss is a new fall of man.
translation: 锡安就是这样一片神圣的领土。我们曾经失去她好几次，每一次失去都是一次新的堕落。

original: And after each fall, we weep in strange new lands and dream of Zion, dream of visiting vengeance upon those who took it from us.
translation: 每次倒下之后，我们在陌生的新土地上哭泣，梦见锡安，梦见向夺走它的人复仇。

original: But this is the waking world in which we live. There is no need to cry, no need to dream. We can act now and stop the White Legs here.
translation: 但这就是我们所生活的现实世界。没必要哭，没必要做梦。我们现在就可以行动，阻止白腿。

original: Well, I'm guessing you're pretty mad about something.
translation: 好吧，我猜你对某些事情非常生气。

original: The White Legs didn't just force my people out of New Canaan. They butchered everyone who wasn't fast enough to get away.
translation: 白腿不仅把我的族人赶出了新迦南，他们屠杀了所有跑得不够快的人。

original: The elderly, the ill, children. Those who stopped to help the wounded. It made no difference to them. They can't be reasoned with, the White Legs.
translation: 老人，病人，孩子，那些停下来帮助伤者的人。这对他们来说没有区别，白腿，他们不讲道理。

original: Daniel believes that if we leave, if the Sorrows leave, the White Legs will stop. He doesn't understand what this kind of tribe is like.
translation: 丹尼尔相信，如果我们离开这里，如果悲恸部落离开这里，那么白腿部落就会停止这一切。但他根本不了解那种部落究竟是什么样的。

original: Are the New Canaanites really a tribe?
translation: 新迦南人真的可以称为一个部落吗？

original: We wear more clothing than them and understand more about technology, but we're still a tribe, a linked family of families.
translation: 我们穿的比他们多，比他们也掌握着更多的科技，但我们依旧是个部落，一个有着相互联系的大家庭。

original: The Boneyard, Phoenix, New Vegas, they're just places, metal and stone. New Canaan dies, but the tribe lives on.
translation: 晒骨场、凤凰城、新维加斯，这些只是地名、金属和石头。即使新迦南人死了，但部落依然活着。

original: When the walls come tumbling down, when you lose everything you have, you always have family. And your family always has tribe.
translation: 即使世界坍塌，一无所有，你总是还会有家的。有家，就有部落。

original: Why haven't I seen any Sorrows in the valley?
translation: 为什么在这个山谷我看不到任何悲恸部落的人？

original: The Sorrows have many skilled hunters among them, but no warriors. They have not had to deal with war or raiders for decades.
translation: 悲恸部落有很多熟练地猎手，但他们不是战士。他们已经有数十年未对付过掠夺者或参与过战争了。

original: Even though they can hunt a full-grown Yao Guai, they don't know how to deal with the White Legs. That's why we're here.
translation: 即便他们能猎杀成年妖怪，他们完全不懂得如何应对白腿部落的威胁。这就是我们来这的原因。

original: Does the valley belong to the Dead Horses?
translation: 这个山谷属于死马部落吗？

original: The valley belongs to God, but no. The Dead Horses live at Dead Horse Point, up the Colorado River. They came here because I asked them to.
translation: 这个山谷属于上帝，但不属于死马部落。死马部落聚居的地方位于科罗拉多河上方，他们之所以定居于此是因为我要求他们来。

original: Before I... returned to the fold, I visited them years earlier. I looked much different then, but I left an impression on them.
translation: 在我...回到他们中间之前，我曾经见过他们。虽然我看起来和那时完全不同，但他们内心中都依然记着我。

original: I taught them how to hunt more efficiently, how to maintain their weapons and Pre-War equipment. When I returned, they showed their appreciation.
translation: 我曾教他们如何更有效率地捕猎，如何维护武器和战前装备。当我回来时，他们向我表示了感激之情。

original: Why did the White Legs attack my caravan?
translation: 为什么白腿部落袭击我们的商队？

original: They attack everyone who isn't a White Leg, especially caravans. They don't know how to survive on their own, so they have to raid.
translation: 他们会攻击任何不是白腿部落的成员，尤其是商队。他们不知道怎么自生自立，所以他们靠抢劫过活。

original: But as for why they are here, they are trying to wipe us out. All of us.
translation: 但至于他们为什么在这里，他们想消灭我们。我们所有人。

original: They want to join Caesar's Legion, and they can only prove their worth by destroying the New Canaanites and everyone we shelter.
translation: 他们想加入凯撒军团，他们只能通过摧毁新迦南人和我们庇护的所有人来证明自己的价值。

original: Do you ever "fall?"
translation: 你曾经“堕落”过？

original: Every day. Some days are... harder than others.
translation: 每一天。而且有些日子会...更艰难。

original: Ha ha ha! Wait... you don't actually believe that, do you?
translation: 哈哈哈！等等...你不会真的相信，对吧？

original: I know it may be hard for you to accept or even to understand. In my heart, I believe that though I am a sinner, I have been saved.
translation: 我知道这对你来说可能很难接受甚至很难理解。在我心里，我相信虽然我是一个罪人，但我已经得救了。

original: And I believe there is something beyond this rock and this air and this water around us, something more that is waiting for us.
translation: 我相信，在我们周围的岩石、空气和水之外，还有别的东西在等着我们。

original: I have been baptized twice, once in water, once in flame. I will carry the fire of the holy spirit inside until I stand before my Lord for judgment.
translation: 我已经接受了两次洗礼，一次在水中，一次在火里。我将在内心里带着圣灵的火焰，直到我站在我的主面前接受审判。

original: Huh. If you say so.
translation: 哈，如果你这么说。

original: Whether there is a God or not, his existence doesn't depend on what you believe or what I say.
translation: 上帝是否存在，他的存在并不取决于你相信什么或我说什么。

original: There is much to be skeptical of in this world, so it no longer surprises me to learn how many people don't really believe in anything.
translation: 在这个世界上有很多值得怀疑的东西，所以当我知道有多少人真的不相信任何东西时，我不再感到惊讶。

original: But I believe that our Lord was made flesh as Jesus Christ and died to redeem me. And you. And the Sorrows. Even the White Legs. Everyone.
translation: 但我相信，我们的上帝和耶稣一样曾经有血有肉，是个在现实中曾经存在的实体。他的死是为了拯救我、你、悲恸部落、甚至白腿部落，每一个人。

original: Sounds like a good deal.
translation: 听起来不错。

original: In a world filled with misery and uncertainty, it is a great comfort to know that, in the end, there is light in the darkness.
translation: 在一个充满痛苦和不确定的世界里，知道黑暗中终有光明，是一种极大的安慰。

original: Every day, we move closer to our judgment. We must do our best to walk in the footsteps of our Lord and teach others how to do the same.
translation: 每天，我们都要自我反省。我们必须尽力跟随主的脚步，并教导别人如何这样做。

original: For many of us, the road is a difficult one, but the path is always there for us to follow, no matter how many times we may fall.
translation: 对于我们很多人来说，这条路是艰难的，但无论我们跌倒多少次，这条路总是在那里等着我们去走。

original: What's going on with all of these... tribes?
translation: 这些部落间究竟发生了什么？

original: A great deal. There are three, make that four, tribes here in Zion. You've already met the White Legs on the way in.
translation: 一件很麻烦的事件。锡安这里共3个，哦，或者说4个部落。你在来的路上已经见过白腿部落了。

original: In this camp, you'll find Dead Horses. In the Narrows, the Sorrows. And finally there's Daniel and myself. We're New Canaanites.
translation: 在这个营地，你能找到死马部落。在狭路，是悲恸部落。最后就是丹尼尔和我，我们是新迦南人。

original: Do you run the show around here?
translation: 这里你说了算？

original: I wouldn't say that. I am the acting war chief for the Dead Horses. They look up to me for such matters, but I only have the authority they give me.
translation: 我不会这么说。我是死马部落的临时战争酋长。他们在这些事情上仰视我，但我只有他们赋予我的权力。

original: Daniel is the spiritual leader and main link of the New Canaanites to the Sorrows. He's up in the Narrows right now.
translation: 丹尼尔对悲恸部落的人来说是精神领袖，也是新迦南人与悲恸部落的唯一纽带。他现在就在狭路。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我们谈谈别的。

original: Of course.
translation: 好的，当然。

original: Do they speak... our language?
translation: 他们也说...我们的语言吗？

original: Most don't. It's been hundreds of years since the war. They've developed their own languages.
translation: 大部分都不会。自从上一次大战后，已经过去了数百年。他们已经发展出了他们自己的语言。

original: Take the Dead Horses. We think they were originally refugees from a place called "Res," east of the Grand Canyon.
translation: 以死马部落为例。我们认为他们最初是来自大峡谷东面的叫“雷斯”的地方的难民。

original: They speak a combination of Res and a language spoken by travelers who were visiting Res when the bombs fell. Over time, the two languages blended.
translation: 他们说一种雷斯方言与核弹爆炸时当地旅行者所说的语言。时间长了，两种语言就结合在一起了。

original: I was a translator years ago, but it's hard to keep up with all of the tribal variations.
translation: 多年前我是一名翻译，但很难跟上所有的部落变化。

original: Thanks for the offer, but I'll handle it myself.
translation: 谢谢你的邀请，但我自己能够处理。

original: I don't think so.
translation: 我可不这么认为。

original: The Divide blocked all of their northern land routes?
translation: 大裂谷阻挡了所有通往北部的路线？

original: Not all of them. But they couldn't take 127 north to get around the mountains.
translation: 并非所有。但他们已经无法沿着127道从北面通过群山。

original: As if Death Valley weren't enough, they had the Divide and Big Empty to deal with.
translation: 而且除了死亡山谷以外，他们还要应付大裂谷和大空洞。

original: From what the Legion's explorers reported, the Big Empty may as well have been a wall to any living thing approaching it.
translation: 据军团探险家的报告，大空洞可能像一道墙一样，会阻挡任何靠近它的生物。

original: What's at the Divide?
translation: 大裂谷有什么？

original: I don't know for certain, and I don't think NCR knows, either. Whatever happened at the Divide was too much for them to handle.
translation: 我不太清楚，而且我觉得NCR可能也不知道。不管大裂谷发生了什么，对他们来说都很棘手。

original: Our frumentarii told us what they saw. Only fools and madmen would march into a place like that. All roads wind down to the same spot, the grave.
translation: 我们的特务告诉了我们他们看见的一切。只有傻子和疯子才会前往那么一个地方，所有的道路最终只会通往一个终点 — 坟墓。

original: They said all that's left there is a gaping wound cut into the Earth, cursed and damned. No place for God-fearing folk.
translation: 他们说那里只剩下一个裂开的伤口，在地球上，被诅咒，下地狱。敬畏上帝的人无处可去。

original: I'm guessing you don't like Caesar very much.
translation: 我猜你不太喜欢凯撒。

original: Love the sinner, hate the sin. With Caesar, it's often very difficult to see through all of that sin to the person inside.
translation: 爱罪人，恨罪恶。对于凯撒来说，要看穿他内心的罪恶是非常困难的。

original: I can say that we were both lucky that NCR's supply lines and land routes north of Mojave Outpost were destroyed before the Battle of Hoover Dam.
translation: 可以说，我们开始一直很幸运，因为NCR的补给线和莫哈维前哨战以北的路线在胡佛大坝一战前早已被完全摧毁。

original: Something bad happened near Death Valley, at a place called the Divide. NCR couldn't cut across anymore and it slowed down their reinforcements.
translation: 在靠近死亡山谷的地方发生了很严重的事情，在一个叫大裂谷的地方。NCR因为无法顺利穿越，他们的增援行动被严重减缓。

original: Terrible storms ripped entire companies apart before they even got to Nevada soil. The aftermath of Hoover Dam could have been even worse for Caesar.
translation: 恐怖的风暴在他们到达莫哈维之前就将他们撕得四分五裂。要不是如此，恐怕胡佛大坝一战凯撒军团的遭遇会更糟。

original: Do you know about Mr. House?
translation: 你如何看待豪斯先生？

original: I had heard of him, but when we were preparing to enter the Mojave, he didn't seem relevant to what was happening.
translation: 我听说过他，但当我们准备进入莫哈维的时候，他看起来似乎对正在发生的一切漠不关心。

original: From what I've learned since Hoover Dam, he handled the Mojave tribes in a fashion not entirely dissimilar from Caesar. It's too bad.
translation: 据我从胡佛大坝事件中了解到，他处理莫哈韦部落的方式与凯撒并无二致。这太糟糕了。

original: What do you think of NCR?
translation: 你如何看待NCR？

original: Better than Caesar, but that's not a high standard. Too much love of money and ownership, not enough love of God and giving.
translation: 总之比凯撒要好，但这标准也不高。过于热衷金钱和贪婪，缺乏虔诚和对上帝的爱。

original: Any society that derives its power and authority from the will of man alone lives apart from God and will crumble in the end.
translation: 任何仅从人的意志中获得权力和权威的社会，都脱离了上帝，最终将会崩溃。

original: What do you know about the war between Caesar and NCR?
translation: 你对凯撒和NCR之间的战争了解多少？

original: I try not to involve myself with matters of the Mojave anymore. All I know is from before the Battle of Hoover Dam.
translation: 我尽量不再插手莫哈韦的事。我只知道胡佛大坝战役之前的事。

original: Are you in much pain? Is there anything I can do to help?
translation: 你很痛苦吗？我能为你做什么？

original: [SUCCEEDED] You are kind to offer, but no, there's nothing you can do. We don't use chems, but I learned long ago that I'm immune to their effects.
translation: [成功] 谢谢你的好意，但不必了。我们不需要药剂，我很久以前就已经学会了如何免疫那些效果。

original: It never stops burning. My skin. Every day, I have to unwind the bandages and replace them with fresh ones.
translation: 它从不停止燃烧，我的皮肤。每天，我都要解开绷带，换上新的。

original: Exposing my body to the air is like living through it again. But it's better to be clean than comfortable.
translation: 把我的身体暴露在空气中，就像再经历一次。但现在，保持干净和清洁比活得舒适要重要得多。

original: How did you survive?
translation: 你是怎么活下来的？

original: I survived because the fire inside burned brighter than the fire around me. I fell down into that dark chasm, but the flame burned on and on.
translation: 我能活下来，是因为内心的火焰比周围的烈火更加强烈。我掉进了那个黑暗的深渊，但火焰一直在燃烧。

original: The next morning, I woke up and crawled out of the northern edge of the Grand Canyon, that cursed place. It took me three months to reach New Canaan.
translation: 第二天早上我醒来之后，爬出了大峡谷的北部悬崖，那个被诅咒的地方。我花了3个月才到达新迦南。

original: It was as though the prodigal son had returned. They welcomed me like I had never left, never done anything to shame them.
translation: 我有种在外放浪的游子终于回家一样的感觉。他们欢迎我，就像我从来没有离开过，从来没有做过任何让他们感到羞耻的事情一样。

original: The fire that had kept me alive was love. Their love. God's love. I will never be able to repay the debt I owe to them, but I must try.
translation: 让我活下去的火焰是爱，他们的爱，上帝的爱。我永远无法偿还我欠他们的债，但我必须努力。

original: How did you end up as Caesar's legate?
translation: 是什么导致你作为凯撒的特使这一地位终结的？

original: This way lies the path to hell. Edw- Caesar needed me to translate. Translation became giving orders. Giving orders became leading in battle.
translation: 这条路完全就是通向地狱。爱德...哦凯撒，一开始他需要我为他作翻译。慢慢的，翻译就变成了下达命令。下达命令就变成了指挥战役。

original: Leading in battle became training, punishing, terrorizing. A series of small mistakes before a great fall.
translation: 指挥战役就意味着要训练、惩罚、恐吓。也因此开始了我在迈入深渊前的一系列致命罪恶。

original: And I stayed in that darkness until after Hoover Dam. After I failed Caesar and he had me burned alive, thrown into the Grand Canyon.
translation: 我就这么呆在深渊里，直到胡佛大战之后。因为我令他尝到了失败的苦果，他把我活生生地投到了火里，然后我就被扔进了大峡谷。

original: Was one of those men Caesar?
translation: 其中有凯撒吗？

original: No, not then. Back then he was just Edward. Smart man. Young, but we all were. We thought we could hike into the Grand Canyon and talk to Blackfoots.
translation: 不，那时还没有。那时他还只是爱德华，他年轻，聪明，但我们都曾经如此。我们当时觉得我们可以徒步走进大峡谷，与黑脚族交谈。

original: We did, and the Blackfoots were friendly enough at first, but eventually... I've thought back to that day so many times. I must have mistranslated.
translation: 我们去了，黑脚族一开始也很友好，但最终...我无数次地回想起那一天。我一定是翻译错了。

original: Something must have been mixed up, because the Blackfoots decided we weren't going to leave. The rest is history, assuming Edward hasn't changed it.
translation: 我们之间一定是发生误会了，因为黑脚族后来甚至决定不许我们离开。剩下的都是历史了，前提是爱德华没改变。

original: What are those bandages for?
translation: 那些绷带是怎么回事？

original: [FAILED] For injuries I suffered long ago.
translation: [失败] 因为我很久以前受的伤。

original: Were you always with the New Canaanites?
translation: 你之前一直和新迦南人在一起？

original: I was born in Ogden, what people came to call New Canaan. Things were more peaceful when I was growing up.
translation: 我出生在奥格登，人们通常称那里为新迦南。我小时候，那里充满了和平气息。

original: When I was a young man, I went out into the world to do missionary work as all New Canaanites do.
translation: 当我成长为一个年轻人时，如同其他新迦南人一样，我步入了外面的世界开始我的传教生涯。

original: I traveled along the Long 15 and followed 89 south into Arizona. Along the way, I met two men from a group called the Followers of the Apocalypse.
translation: 我沿着15号公路，顺着89号路往南进入亚利桑那。一路上，我遇到了两个人，他们自称是来自一个叫天启追随者的团体。

original: Edward Sallow and Bill Calhoun. They came to teach the tribes. Calhoun was a good man. Edward was the one who got us into trouble down the road.
translation: 爱德华·萨洛和比尔·卡尔霍恩。他们准备去教导部落。卡尔霍恩是个好人，爱德华则令我们一路麻烦不断。

original: Can I ask you some personal questions?
translation: 我能问你一些私人问题吗？

original: Right now, I'd like you to focus on helping Daniel. Maybe there will be time later.
translation: 现在，我需要你集中注意帮助丹尼尔。或许晚些我们再谈比较好。

original: It's not something I enjoy, but I pray to God that someone may learn from my mistakes. What would you like to know?
translation: 我不喜欢这样，但我祈求上帝有人能从我的错误中吸取教训。你想知道什么？

original: I have a few questions for you.
translation: 我有一些问题想问你。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: God be with you.
translation: 愿上帝与你同在。

original: Fine, I'll look into getting those supplies for Daniel.
translation: 好吧，我去帮丹尼尔弄些补给。

original: Do you have anything to trade?
translation: 你有东西要交易吗？

original: We do. Though the White Legs destroyed New Canaan, they didn't destroy all of our supply caches.
translation: 我们有。虽然白腿部落摧毁了新迦南，但他们没摧毁我们的补给。

original: All forms of currency are recognized here. Caps, NCR dollars, even Legion coin. Take a look.
translation: 我们接受任何种类的货币。瓶盖、NCR美元、甚至军团硬币。好了，你看看吧。

original: Yes. Take a look.
translation: 可以的，你看看好了。

original: Sorry to bother you with reality, ol' Jed. Who cares if we can't get back out the way we come?  That's not a problem.
translation: 抱歉，老杰德，还是关注一下现在吧。鬼才在乎我们能不能找到回去的路？那不是个问题。

original: Shhhhh! Hold on, now... Could swear I heard something up ahead.
translation: 嘘！等一下，听...我发誓我听见前面有什么声音。

original: I'll take a look, boss! Keep me covered!
translation: 我过去看一下，老大！掩护我！

original: On your feet! Keep fighting! Come on now, I got ya...
translation: 注意脚下！继续还击！来吧，我抓到...

original: Enough of this! We're sitting ducks here! Here I come! I was a sheriff once, goddamn it!
translation: 够了！我们不能坐以待毙！看我的！我他妈以前可是个警长，操！

original: Shut the hell up, Ricky! Might as well be waving at them!
translation: 闭上你的臭嘴，里基！快朝他们射击！

original: I don't deserve this! My Pip-Boy don't even work! Why the fuck you hire me?
translation: 我今天怎么这么倒霉！我的哔哔小子也没响应了！你他妈当初为什么雇我？

original: You want some, assholes? You just pissed off the wrong guy! And that means Ricky!
translation: 你想尝尝子弹吗，傻逼？你惹恼我了！我是里基！

original: Ambush! Tribals, and they mean blood!
translation: 埋伏！是部落，他们意味着鲜血！

original: Stella!... Oh no! Don't you die on me, woman, you hear?
translation: 史黛拉！...噢，不！我不许你死，你听见了没？！

original: Holy hell! Stay low, people, stay low...
translation: 天啊！俯下身子，大家，蹲下...

original: Goddammit, ambush! Cover, people! Watch yourselves!
translation: 我操，是埋伏！隐蔽，大家！保持警惕！

original: Didn't nobody do this to you but yourself, junkie. Now try suffering in silence for once.
translation: 除了你自己外没人像你这样，你个垃圾。现在给我安静一会儿！

original: You ain't got no heart, Stella! I swear, you're a monster, and you're gonna regret treating me like this!
translation: 你他妈真没良心，史黛拉！我发誓，你个臭女人，你早晚会后悔今天这么对我！

original: You ain't sick! You're a goddamn junkie, that's what you are! So shut it!
translation: 你没病！你就是个该死的瘾君子！所以赶紧闭嘴吧！

original: You don't know how this feels, Stella! I'm sick! Never been so sick my whole life!
translation: 你根本不知道这是什么感觉，史黛拉！我病了！我这辈子都没这么难受过！

original: Enough! Another word of your bitching and I'll put you out of your misery myself!
translation: 够了！再发一句牢骚我就亲自结束你的痛苦！

original: Goddammit, never should joined this assbackwards caravan...
translation: 上帝啊，早知道我就不来这个莫名其妙的商队了...

original: Dream on, Stella. Ricky ain't about to die for nobody. Ricky's fucking in-vin-cible, yessir!
translation: 做梦吧，史黛拉。里基不会为任何人而死，里基是赢家，没错，完全同意！

original: Sounds like you got enough for a fatal overdose, then. Do us all a favor, will ya?
translation: 看起来你已经吸得够多了。为了我们大家，你表现好点行不行？

original: Best fix for you'd be a bullet in the brainpan. Now shut it.
translation: 最好的办法就是一枪爆了你的头，现在可以闭嘴了吧。

original: Don't worry, Stella! This was my last hit, but thanks to ol' Johnny-come-lately over there, Ricky got some Fixer to take the edge off.
translation: 别担心，史黛拉！这是我最后一针，多亏了那边那个新来的老伙计，里基搞到了点瘾头解。

original: Don't worry, Stella! This was my last hit, but thanks to ol' Janey-come-lately over there, Ricky got some Fixer to take the edge off.
translation: 别担心，史黛拉！这是我最后一针，多亏了那边那个新来的老姐们，里基搞到了点瘾头解。

original: Don't worry, Stella! Ol' Ricky won't be running out of Psycho any time soon! Ol' Ricky's downright flush! Yes indeed!
translation: 别担心，史黛拉！老里基还有不少疯狂药呢！你看那个里基满脸通红，跟猴屁股似的！

original: Shut your mouth, you goddamn junkie! Or I'll plant one between your shoulder blades, I swear!
translation: 闭上你的嘴，你这个该死的瘾君子！否则我就在你肩胛骨中间放一枪，我发誓！

original: "That's right, little lady. Everything will be just fine with Jed to protect you. Quite the leader is what I am, hell yes."
translation: “你说的没错，小姑娘！有我杰德保护你，一切都会没事的。我可是个相当称职的领袖，你放心。"

original: Oh I'm sure you're right, Jed. What's the worst can happen to us out here? Nothing. Perfectly safe, fucking perfectly...
translation: 噢，我相信你是对的，杰德。我们在这还能发生什么坏事呢？什么都不会。绝对安全，太他妈的安全了...

original: "Heard you the fifteenth time, Stella. What's it matter if we're trapped here? Everything will be just fine."
translation: "我已经听你唠叨了快15次了，史黛拉。即使我们被困在这里又有什么关系呢？一切都会没事的。“

original: In the shadow of Daniel's death, those Sorrows who survived the assault on Zion Valley mourned his loss, as was their custom.
translation: 从锡安峡谷一战中幸存下来的悲恸部落族人，沉浸在丹尼尔牺牲的巨大悲痛中。他们以自己传统的方式悼念这位精神导师与朋友。

original: Word of Daniel's passing reached the New Canaanites several weeks later. They prayed that their brother would be well-received by their Lord.
translation: 丹尼尔的死讯几周后传到了新迦南人的耳中，他们祈祷他们的兄弟能够得到上帝的欢迎。

original: After leading the Sorrows from their home in Zion to safety in Grand Staircase, Daniel continued to wonder if he'd made the right choice.
translation: 在率领悲恸部落离开锡安峡谷前往安全的大阶梯地区后，丹尼尔一直在思考他所做的这个选择是否明智。

original: He spent his life evangelizing the beliefs of his people to a new generation of young men and women, as his ancestors had for centuries before him.
translation: 正如他几个世纪以前的先辈们一样，他毕生都在向一代又一代年轻人传播着上帝的福音。

original: He was happy with his family, but for the rest of his life there were nights when he awoke with sadness to find he had been dreaming of Zion.
translation: 和他的家人在一起，他感到很快乐，但在他的余生中，有那么几个夜晚他总会悲伤的醒来，发现自己一次又一次地在梦中回到他情牵的锡安。

original: For years after the defeat of the White Legs, Daniel did his best to minister to the Sorrows' spiritual needs.
translation: 在击退白腿部落数年之后，丹尼尔竭尽全力满足悲恸部落的精神需求。

original: Try as he might, he could not hold back the tribe's increasing militancy and reverence of Joshua Graham.
translation: 然而尽管他耗尽心力，却依然无法阻止整个悲恸部落日益增长的好战性和对约书亚·格雷厄姆的尊崇。

original: Demoralized, he returned to his family and Dead Horse Point. His failures haunted him for the rest of his days.
translation: 他心灰意冷的回到了他的家庭和死马岬角，强烈的失败感一直折磨着他，直到余生的终结。

original: After a long and troubled life, Joshua Graham finally found rest in Zion.
translation: 在经历了漫长而坎坷的一生后，约书亚·格拉汉姆终于在锡安得到了安息。

original: In the end, his unswerving militancy had accomplished what the NCR's finest sharpshooters and Caesar's wrath could not.
translation: 最后一战，他坚定不移的信念帮助他完成了包括NCR最优秀的神枪手和凯撒的愤怒都无法完成的事迹。

original: The New Canaanites took comfort in the belief that their brother's soul would again dwell in Zion at the end of days.
translation: 新迦南人相信他们兄弟的灵魂会在末日时再次居住在锡安，从而得到了安慰。

original: The threat of the White Legs ended, Joshua Graham helped the Sorrows and Dead Horses tend to their fallen comrades and secure Zion.
translation: 白腿部落的威胁终于结束了，约书亚·格拉汉姆开始帮助悲恸部落和死马部落照料他们倒下的同伴，并确保锡安的安全。

original: The Courier's words had stayed Joshua's wrath in his darkest hour, and in sparing Salt-Upon-Wounds, he was changed.
translation: 邮差的劝告在约书亚内心最黑暗的时候平息了他的愤怒。在赦免了伤口撒盐后，他发生了改变。

original: While he continued to advocate militant opposition to the enemies of New Canaan, he sometimes showed quarter to those who crossed his family.
translation: 虽然他继续主张强硬对抗新迦南人的敌人，但有时也会对冒犯家人的敌人表现出仁慈与宽容。

original: Eventually this new spirit would diminish the myth of the Burned Man in distant lands - a small price for the peace it brought to Joshua Graham.
translation: 最终，这种新的精神将在遥远的土地上消弭“火烧人”的神话，这是它给约书亚·格拉汉姆带来和平的一个小小的赏金。

original: With the White Legs crushed, Joshua Graham led the Sorrows and Dead Horses in tearing apart and burning the corpses of their enemies.
translation: 随着白腿部落的崩溃，约书亚·格拉汉姆带着悲恸部落和死马部落撕碎并焚烧着敌人的尸体。

original: He set about training his army in the "Way of the Canaanite," and soon the New Canaanites and tribes of Zion were feared well into the Mojave.
translation: 他开始以“新迦南之道”训练一支属于他自己支配的部队。没多久，对新迦南人和锡安部落的恐惧便传遍了莫哈维。

original: Legends of the Burned Man grew even more depraved, and terrifying.
translation: 关于“火烧人”的传说变得更加邪恶，更加可怕。

original: Though the Courier had stopped Joshua Graham from executing Salt-Upon-Wounds, the war chief still fell in battle.
translation: 虽然邮差制止了约书亚·格拉汉姆处决伤口撒盐，但这位战争领主还是在战场上倒下了。

original: The White Legs defeated at Three Marys, Joshua led the Sorrows and Dead Horses in tending to their comrades and burning the corpses of their foes.
translation: 在三玛丽岩给予白腿部落以重创后，约书亚带着悲恸部落和死马部落开始照料受伤的同伴，并焚烧敌人的尸体。

original: He continued to advocate militant opposition to the enemies of New Canaan and showed little quarter to those he fought. And yet he was changed.
translation: 他继续主张激进地对抗新迦南人的敌人，对那些与他战斗的人毫不留情。然而他还是改变了。

original: He no longer reveled in the brutality and cruelty for which he had been known in his former life.
translation: 他不再沉溺于过去人生中的野蛮和残忍。

original: His inner demons, if not extinguished, were at the least... appeased.
translation: 他内心的恶魔，即使还没有消失的话，那么至少...也缓和了。

original: Waking Cloud turned bitter and resentful toward Daniel and the New Canaanites when she learned her husband's death had been concealed from her.
translation: 唤醒白云在得知她丈夫的死讯始终被隐瞒后，对丹尼尔和新迦南人心怀怨恨。

original: She poisoned some of her tribe against New Canaanite teachings, making relations between the groups difficult from time to time.
translation: 她让部分族人对新迦南人的教义心怀恶感，给各部落之间的关系蒙上了一层阴影。

original: Waking Cloud was distraught when she learned of her husband's death, but took comfort from her tribe, and the compassion of the New Canaanites.
translation: 当唤醒白云得知丈夫的死讯后，心里异常痛苦，但她得到了族人和新迦南人的安慰与同情。

original: She forgave Daniel for having concealed her husband's fate from her, and learned to accept his fate.
translation: 她原谅了丹尼尔对她丈夫死讯的隐瞒，并学会了接受他的命运。

original: When her grief faded, she took a husband from the Dead Horse tribe. At her bidding, he stayed close to home.
translation: 当悲痛逝去，她从死马部落接纳了一位新的丈夫。按照她的吩咐，他待在离家很近的地方。

original: Follows-Chalk took the Courier's words to heart and decided that the big cities of the Mojave Wasteland and NCR were best left unexplored.
translation: 追踪印记把邮差的话牢记在心，决定不再去探索莫哈维和NCR所在的那些大城市。

original: Though he sometimes dreamed of distant lands, he continued to support his family at Dead Horse Point, and eventually his wanderlust faded.
translation: 尽管他有时还会梦到遥远的未知地域，但他还是尽全力支持位于死马岬角的家人。最终，他的流浪梦想随之退去。

original: Follows-Chalk took the Courier's words to heart and decided that he would behold the sights and sounds of distant lands with his own eyes and ears.
translation: 追踪印记牢记邮差的话，决定用自己的眼睛和耳朵去观察遥远国度的景象和声音。

original: After returning to Dead Horse Point, he quarreled with his family and other tribe members about his ambitions.
translation: 在返回死马岬角后，他因自己的目标与他的家人和族人发生激烈争吵。

original: One morning, they awoke to discover that Follows-Chalk had set off alone, westward, into the wilderness.
translation: 一天早晨，他的族人醒来后，发现追踪印记已经独自起程，向西远去。

original: He was never seen again.
translation: 从此，再也没有人见过他的身影。

original: Already weakened by several seasons of bad trading, the Happy Trails Caravan Company was devastated by the failure of its expedition.
translation: 欢乐小径商队公司在接连几个季度的糟糕贸易中备受打击，而这次探险的失败彻底摧毁了他们。

original: The New Canaanites never reestablished ties with the caravan.
translation: 新迦南人再也没有与他们建立任何联系。

original: Their experiences with outsiders near the Great Salt Lake and in Zion had been far too negative.
translation: 他们与位于大盐湖和锡安附近的人交流的作用微乎其微。

original: Within six months, the Happy Trails Caravan Company was bankrupted and dissolved.
translation: 不到半年，欢乐欢乐商队公司便破产解散了。

original: Already weakened by several seasons of bad trading, the Happy Trails Caravan Company was initially discouraged by the results of its expedition.
translation: 由于在接连几个季度的糟糕贸易中备受打击，欢乐小径商队公司最初对这次探险的结果十分沮丧。

original: The fate of New Canaan, and the evacuation of the Sorrows from Zion, made the prospect of trading seem fruitless.
translation: 新迦南未知的命运以及悲恸部落从锡安的撤离令贸易前景非常渺茫。

original: When Daniel told his family about the exploits of Happy Trails' employee, the Courier, however, New Canaan decided to repay the company's kindness.
translation: 然而当丹尼尔告诉他的家人们关于一个欢乐小径商队的员工——邮差所作出的贡献时，新迦南人决定报答这家公司的好意。

original: Twice per year, New Canaanites made the dangerous journey west to trade with the company in the city of New Reno.
translation: 每年两次，新迦南人冒险向西，到新里诺城与该公司进行贸易。

original: The Happy Trails Caravan Company could not survive on such trading alone, but the New Canaanite's generosity made tough times go easier.
translation: 尽管欢乐小径商队公司无法仅靠这些贸易生存，但新迦南人的慷慨已经令他们的艰难的日子好过许多了。

original: The defeat of the White Legs in Zion marked a turning point in the fortunes of the Happy Trails Caravan Company.
translation: 白腿部落在锡安的失败成为了欢乐小径商队公司命运的转折点。

original: Every two months, the caravan met with the New Canaanites in Zion Valley to trade. Happy Trails soon returned to prosperity.
translation: 现在，商队每两个月来锡安峡谷与新迦南人碰面贸易，欢乐小径很快恢复了繁荣。

original: The vigilance of the Sorrows and Dead Horses in defending southwestern Utah, initially startling to Happy Trails caravans, soon proved a blessing.
translation: 悲恸部落和死马部落警惕地守卫着犹他州的西南部。欢乐小径最初感到很吃惊，但很快就证明了这是一件好事。

original: The tribes united against the 80s, driving them back from Highway 50, and thus opening yet another trading route for Happy Trails caravans.
translation: 这两个部落在联合对抗“80号公路帮”，并把他们赶回50号高速公路，而这也因此为欢乐旅行商队开辟了一条新的贸易路线。

original: Having revered Joshua Graham as a living legend for so many years, the Dead Horses found it difficult to accept his death.
translation: 多年来，死马部落一直将约书亚·格拉汉姆尊为传奇人物，他们很难接受他的死亡。

original: New Canaanite missionaries sought to remain in contact with the tribe, but lacking Joshua's authority, their influence dwindled.
translation: 新的迦南传教士试图与部落保持联系，但缺乏约书亚的权威，他们的影响力逐渐减弱。

original: Still, as an expression of enduring respect for their lost spiritual leader, the Dead Horses helped protect the lands where New Canaanites settled.
translation: 然而，为了表达对他们对这位逝去的精神领袖的尊敬，死马部落仍然愿意帮助新迦南人保护他们定居的土地。

original: As generations passed, the Dead Horses came to worship a spirit of the land, a harsh spirit of divine justice. They called it Joshua.
translation: 经过数代人的变迁，死马部落形成了一种神圣的正义感，一种他们称之为这片土地的精神，他们称之为——“约书亚”精神。

original: Having helped Daniel and the Sorrows escape from Zion, the Dead Horses returned to their home at Dead Horse Point.
translation: 在帮助丹尼尔和悲恸部落撤离锡安之后，死马部落回到了他们位于死马岬角的家。

original: The tribe continued to learn from the New Canaanites, and over many years built a flourishing community along the banks of the Colorado.
translation: 他们继续向新迦南人学习知识，并在随后的数年时间里沿着科罗拉多河建成了一个繁华的部族群落。

original: Though the tribes' bond would endure, it was Joshua Graham's legend the Dead Horses would revere, not the tenets of New Canaan's faith.
translation: 虽然部落之间的纽带会持续下去，但死马部落尊敬的是约书亚·格雷厄姆的传说，而不是新迦南人信仰的教义。

original: Having helped eradicate the White Legs from Zion, the Dead Horses returned to Dead Horse Point in triumph.
translation: 在帮助丹尼尔和悲恸部落撤离锡安之后，死马部落凯旋般回到了他们位于死马岬角的家。

original: They remained neutral toward the Sorrows, but as years went on, there were periods of competitive friction, even violence, between the tribes.
translation: 他们对悲恸部落保持中立，但随着时间流逝，两个部落之间开始出现频繁的矛盾与摩擦，甚至演变成暴力。

original: The New Canaanites - Daniel especially - intervened regularly as mediators, but found it difficult to reconcile the tribes' conflicts.
